label: 3 Terracotta female figures
description: Three abstractions of human figures sculpted in terracotta stand in a row. Each is balanced on a column that flares outward where it meets the ground. Two of the figures show bodies shaped like disks on top of their bases, with parallel wavy lines painted across them. Two figures have no arms, two bumps for breasts, and a rounded head with a painted mask. The third figure’s body is a sphere on top of the column base with a molded suggestion of crossed arms at the chest. The head is shaped like a candle’s base, with a face painted on narrow portion and decorative edge motif around the circular flat top.
meta.Alt Text: Three Terracotta female figures
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York
meta.Subject: Mycenean

label: A Hundred Birds Admiring the Peacock
description: This painting is of many colorful birds flitting around two peacocks by the banks of a waterway
meta.Alt Text: Painting of many colorful birds flitting around two peacocks by the banks of a waterway

label: Ain Ghazal Statues
description: A crude statue of a person. The figure is missing arms. Its legs are turned inward. The face is contoured to show nose, brows, and chin. A thin line in the plaster suggests a mouth, and eyes are drawn on with black pigment.
meta.Alt Text: A crude statue of a person
meta.Subject: Jordan, Neolithic

label: Akbar Taming Mad Elephant Hawai
description: On the left panel, two elephants run across a river's bridge that is supported by boats, while people dive and swim nearby. A man is riding one of the elephants. On the right panel, a crowd of people watch the elephants and react with various expressions ranging from panic to mild concern.
meta.Alt Text: Painting of a king directing his subjects to tame an elephant

label: Akhenaten & Family Blessed by Aten
description: A relief carved in a rectangle of stone shows two seated figures, facing each other, holding children. Above and between them is a sun showering down rays.
meta.Alt Text: A relief carved in a rectangle of stone shows two seated figures, facing each other, holding children.
meta.Subject: Akhenaten

label: Akhenaten as Sphinx
description: On a flat rectangular stone surface is carved in relief a sun-shaped disk in the upper left, radiating lines downward.  At the ends of the lines are hands, some holding ahks. Beneath the disk are candle-shaped offering stands. Facing the rays on the right is a crouching lion’s body with a human head and arms that are lifted in gestures of respect and offerings.  Egyptian hieroglyphs, some encircled in cartouches, are above the lion’s body and on the left.
rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection
meta.Alt Text: Stone relief of Akhenaten as Sphinx
meta.Location: Current: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Egyptian New Kingdom Gallery (Gallery 210)
meta.Rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection
meta.Subject: Akhenaten

label: Akkadian Ruler Head
description: The life-sized bronze head features a robust beard and strong facial features. The left eye socket is intact, but the right eye socket has been gouged out violently. A headpiece with textured triangular patterns crowns the head.
rights: ArtStor © 2006, SCALA, Florence / ART RESOURCE, N.Y.
meta.Alt Text: life-sized bronze head
meta.Rights: ArtStor © 2006, SCALA, Florence / ART RESOURCE, N.Y.

description: This large tapestry depicts what could be either Hector or Alexander the Great holding a shield with the image of a lion and large sword; he sits in a vaulted niche on the lower register of the tapestry, surrounded on sides and top by seven smaller niches that show warriors and aristocratic women on a smaller scale than the main figure.
meta.Alt Text: Tapestry showing what could be either Hector or Alexander the Great holding a sword and a shield with the image of a lion.

label: Alhambra Palace
description: A crenellated wall made of red brick spans the photograph, punctuated by four rectangular square-topped battlement towers.  Beyond the wall are other buildings with arched, square, and round windows, and a tower. In the background are rocky peaks of a distant mountain range.
meta.Alt Text: Large building on a cliff with trees surrounding it. Mountain ranges are seen in the background.

label: Amunhotep III
description: A carved wood statuette of a human form on an inscribed wooden base, with the left leg advanced. The arms are missing. A crown with uraeus body coiled in front rests atop the head. The eyes gaze forward, inlaid with glass. The figure wears a gold leaf kilt with wide border at top, incised with floral motifs.

label: Angelico: The Annunciation
description: Underneath a closed collonaded porch, with both rounded and pointed arches, and a garden, fence, and woods visible in the background, an angel in a pink robe, arms folded, kneels in front of a seated woman in a blue robe, whose folded arms mimic the angel's.  They are looking into each other's eyes. At the back of the porch is a doorway to a room with a window in it.
meta.Alt Text: Two figures are under a covered colonnade. One is sitting on a bench, The other has wings and is kneeling.
meta.Location: Current: Convent of San Marco, Florence, Italy
meta.Subject: Annunciation, Gabriel, St Mary

label: Aphrodite (Venus De Milo)
description: A female form carved in marble stands with the weight on her right leg, with her torso swiveled and shoulders tilted. Her garment has slipped to her hips. She gazes with serene expression and neatly coiffed hair. Her arms are missing from her shoulders.
meta.Alt Text: Carved marble female figure, nude to the waist with a draped cloth to the floor.  Both arms are broken at the elbow.
meta.Subject: Venus, Aphrodite

description: A life-size carved marble sculpture shows a nude female figure reaching for a bath towel. Her weight rests on her right leg, while her torso curves to the left. Her head is turned toward the left.
meta.Alt Text: A life-size carved marble sculpture shows a nude female figure reaching for a bath towel.
meta.Location: Current: Museo nazionale romano di palazzo Altemps, Rome

description: This is a Yuan Dynasty landscape of mountains and trees with strong blue and green inks.

label: Baal with Thunderbolt
description: An upright stone slab with relief carvings depicting a standing male figure (representing the Canaanite storm god Baal) who faces right, and stands on a large pedestal carved with mountains and seas. His right hand is upraised, brandishing a club, and his left hand is outstretched, holding a thunderbolt. This figure is bearded, and wears a helmet with bull’s horns. A smaller male figure, bareheaded, stands on a horned altar, between the god and his thunderbolt. (This is thought to be a king of Ugarit.)
meta.Alt Text: An upright stone slab with relief carvings depicting a standing male figure.
meta.Subject: Baal

label: Babur Receives a Courtier
description: The top half of this painting shows a palace decorated with arabesque floral motifs. Two arches and a dome are visible, and above them a garden appears. In the bottom half, a central bearded figure sits on a square throne, surrounded by 14 males of various occupations and positions, and a horse.
meta.Alt Text: Babur sits in his elaborately decorated throne room
meta.Location: Current: Freer | Sackler Museum, Smithsonian Institution, Washington, DC USA
meta.Material: opaque watercolor and gold on paper
meta.Subject: Mughal manuscript, Baburnama

label: Baleen Whale Mask
description: This large whale-shaped carved cedar sculpture is painted with reds, blues, and whites to emphasize the flared nostril, the eye, and the jaw. Other decorative painted shapes appear on a collar, around the blow-hole, and along the sides and the fluted tail.  Moveable fins would have enhanced the effect when this mask -- hollowed out so it could be  carried on the back of a dancer -- was worn in ritualized performances.
meta.Alt Text: A large wooden whale-shaped mask is painted black red and blue.
meta.Material: cedar wood, hide, cotton cord, nails, pigment
meta.Subject: Kwakwaka’wakw

label: Banquet Scene in Nebamun's Tomb painting
description: In the upper register, a dozen Egyptian figures are seated in a row of chairs, most of them in profile facing the viewer’s left.  They are dressed in robes, kilts, and jewelry.  A standing nude female offers a dish to one of them.  On a lower register, four seated musicians play instruments on the right, and five on the left, flanking two nearly-nude dancing figures and a group of amphora-shaped jugs in the center. Two musicians are shown full face. There are 15 vertical registers of hieroglyphs visible.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Alt Text: banquet scene in Nebamun's tomb painting in two registers
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Thebes, Tomb of Nebamun, Upper Egypt
meta.Measurements: Height: 88 cm; Width: 119 cm; Thickness: 22 cm; Width: 99.5 cm (painting only)
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Subject: New Kingdom, banquet

description: Drawn in ink and watercolor on paper are a lion and a dragon grappling in fierce face-to-face combat, with the lion's teeth embedded in the dragon's body which is entwining the lion's torso.
meta.Alt Text: A lion and a dragon wrestle.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Cultural Context: Middle Eastern, Iranian, Muslim, Persian, Safavid

label: Basilica of Saint-Denis
description: A photograph shows the west façade of Saint Denis, which has three portals at the ground level, separated by two massive vertical buttresses between them rising three levels high, marked by horizontal string-courses and window arcades that mark each level on the exterior of the building. The central portal is one larger than those either side, topped by a Tympanum and lintel. Above the central portal is a second-level arched window arcade, and above that is a large round rose window in a square frame. Above the right flanking portal and window arcades rises a bell tower.
meta.Alt Text: A cathedral facade shows three portals at the ground level. A second-level arched window arcade shows a large round rose window in a square frame. A bell tower spire rises above.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic
meta.Subject: France, Christianity

label: Basilica of Saint-Sernin, Toulouse
description: An interior view of a church shows a pair of arched recessed rooms, each containing a painting and an altar. A row of wooden pews faces the paired rooms. Above them are a pair of arched balcony openings.
meta.Alt Text: An interior view of a church shows a pair of arched recessed rooms, each containing a painting and an altar. A row of wooden pews face the paired rooms. Above them are a pair of arched balcony openings.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Romanesque
meta.Subject: France, Christianity

description: An octagonal building is seen from the side, showing two stories of arched windows, buttressed supports, and a cupola.
meta.Alt Text: An octagonal building with buttresses and a cupola
meta.Cultural Context: Southern European, Italian, Byzantine, Late Antiquity, Christendom
meta.Subject: Byzantine, Christianity

label: Basilica of Santa Sabina, Interior
description: A central nave is flanked by rows of corinthian columns and arches, above which are rows of stained glass clerestory windows.  At the far end is the apse showing a triumphal arch.
meta.Alt Text: A central nave is flanked by columns and windows.  An apse is at the far end.
meta.Cultural Context: Southern European, Italian, Byzantine, Late Antiquity, Christendom
meta.Style Period: 5th Century CE, Late Antiquity, Early Christian
meta.Subject: Byzantine, Early Christianity

label: Bath of Fasiledes
description: A three-story stone building stands in a giant stone-walled rectangular pool with no water in it. Two arched doorways are at the ground level on each of two visible sides of the building. Above, two arched doorways permit access to a balcony that spans the width of the building. A square tower rises to a third level on the right corner of the building, with round-topped battlements on the tower's roofline.
meta.Alt Text: A castle with arches on the ground floor
meta.Subject: Fasiledes, Gondar

label: Battle of Issus (Alexander Mosaic)
description: This mosaic shows a dramatic moment in a battle: a clash of horses, soldiers, shields and spears. Alexander can be seen on the viewer’s left, representing Greece. On the right, Darius and the Persian army charge toward the center. In the middle, horses wheel and prop under the charioteers’ whip, who are responding to Darius’s order to reverse their charge and flee. On the ground are wounded soldiers.
meta.Alt Text: The mosaic shows a battle scene where two armies of mounted soldiers with shields and spears.
meta.Subject: Alexander the Great, Darius III

label: Battle of Karbala
description: In the center of this oil-on-canvas scene is a bearded, helmeted warrior on a white horse stabbing a bareheaded mustached man on a dark horse in the chest. Surrounding the central scene are dozens of miniature scenes depicting  religious and courtly rituals on the viewer's left, and, on the viewer's right, visual references of heaven and hell.
meta.Alt Text: A bearded, helmeted warrior on a horse stabs a bareheaded mustached man on a dark horse.
meta.Subject: Qajar, Imam Husayn

label: Bayeux Tapestry Death of Harold
description: The embroidery on cloth uses tan, green, red, and two shades of blue thread. The image has an upper register that contains several panels of decorative beasts and beards. The main, central register shows (left to right) a man whose shield has several arrows buried in it, a man who has been struck in the eye by an arrow, and a swordsman on horseback striking down a man with an axe. Above them are stitched the words "Harold Rex Infectus est." The bottom register shows smaller depictions of men in battle, including a man stripping the armor from a dead opponent.
meta.Alt Text: Embroidery on cloth showing the death of King Harold of England from being struck in the eye by an arrow.
meta.Location: Current: Musée de la Tapisserie de Bayeux, Bayeux, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Medieval
meta.Measurements: 70 m (230 ft) long and 50 cm (20 in) tall
meta.Subject: Harold Godwinson, Harold II

label: Bayeux Tapestry Halley's Comet
description: This embroidery on cloth uses tan, green, red, and two shades of blue thread. The image has an upper register that shows a comet at the center and the Latin caption "Isti mirant stella" on the left. In the left lower register we see a group of six men in a castle pointing to the sky; on the right, a man with a sword speaking urgently to an enthroned king in a castle, above whom the name "Harold" is stitched. A narrow band at the bottom of the cloth shows a bird and a group of unmanned longboats.
meta.Alt Text: Embroidery on cloth showing a comet at the center and the Latin caption "Isti mirant stella" on the left.
meta.Location: Current: Musée de la Tapisserie de Bayeux, Bayeux, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Medieval
meta.Measurements: 70 m (230 ft) long and 50 cm (20 in) tall
meta.Subject: Harold Godwinson, Harold II, comet Halley

label: Bearden: The Block
description: This mixed media collage included printed, colored, and metallic papers, graphite, marker, gouache, watercolor, and ink among other mediums. "The Block" was a tribute to New York City's Harlem neighborhood. The original installation included a tape recording of street sounds to enhance the viewer's experience of the work.
meta.Alt Text: Collage of a block of a city neighborhood with cars, people, buildings, and storefronts.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: American, African American, Modernism, Social Realism
meta.Material: mural, collage of pasted paper w/sym. Polymer paint on masonite, 6 panels

label: Beardsley: Cover of "The Yellow Book: an Illustrated Quarterly"
description: This is the cover of a periodical that depicts a woman on the right side of the image against a light background; her bountiful dark hair contrasts with her light face, and this contrast is picked up in the light and dark layering of her dress with its dark bow and wide collar. To the left of the image, set against a dark background, is a low bookshelf on which is a bowl of flowers; the repeating floral image behind that suggests wallpaper. The name of the journal and publication information frame the image on the top and bottom.
meta.Alt Text: The cover of a magazine shows a woman's portrait, lamps, and some books.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Art Nouveau
meta.Material: photomechanical reproduction on thin, slightly textured, orange wove paper, laid on contemporary mount made of moderately thick, slightly textured, cream laid paper

label: Behistun Inscription
description: The Behistun Inscription is a rock face cliff engraving near Mount Behistun (now Kermanshah Province, Iran), which was on the Silk Road. In three languages (Old Persian, Elamite, Babylonian) it describes conquests of Darius the Great. It includes a relief carving of Darius, flanked by his soldiers, facing prisoners, with Faravahar, the symbol of Persia’s state religion, Zoroastrianism, blessing the scene.
meta.Alt Text: A rock face cliff shows engravings in in three languages, Old Persian, Elamite, and Babylonian.
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Mount Behistun, in the foothills of the Zagros mountains, facing the Kermanshah plain (now Province in northwestern Iran).
meta.Cultural Context: Middle Eastern, Iranian, Mesopotamian, Persian, Babylonian, Elamite
meta.Measurements: 15 m high by 25 m wide, and 100 m up a limestone cliff from an ancient road connecting the capitals of Babylonia and Media (Babylon and Ecbatana).
meta.Subject: cuneiform script, Darius I of Persia

label: Bellini: Saint Francis in the Desert
description: In muted tones of yellow, blue, and grey, this oil-on-board scene shows a barfoot bearded figure in a robe standing on a rocky mountain, facing the sun.  Behind him is a roughly built shelter with a vine trellis in front of its entrance.  Under the trellis is a desk with a book and a skull on it. A donkey stands in a grassy plain behind the shelter. In the mountainscape beyond is a gated city with a fortress on its peak.
rights: Artstor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: A man in a robe stands on a cliff. In the distance there is a donkey and a building.

label: Bernini: The Ecstasy of Saint Teresa
description: This sculpture shows a recumbent Saint Teresa in a flowing gown, an angel poised with an arrow above her.
meta.Alt Text: Sculpture showing a recumbent Saint Teresa in a flowing gown, an angel poised with an arrow above her.
meta.Location: Current: Santa Maria della Vittoria, Rome, Italy
meta.Subject: Saint Teresa

label: Bet Maryam
description: A three-story stone square building stands under a modern shade-roof. On the first level are windows showing four cubes at each corner, with a cross-shape bisecting the opening. On the second level and third levels are simple square openings for windows. The roof is pitched.
meta.Alt Text: A three-story stone square building stands under a modern shade-roof with windows on the side. The roof is pitched.
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Beta Giorghis (Church of Saint George)
description: A three-story square building stands in a wide pit. It sits on a three-tiered foundation, with two doorways and two blind windows on the first level. Four windows on the third level show pointed arches. The roof is flat.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO World Heritage Centre 1992-2018
meta.Alt Text: A three-story square building stands in a wide pit. It sits on a three-tiered foundation, with two doorways and windows with pointed arches. The roof is flat.
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO World Heritage Centre 1992-2018
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Bhairava from East Java, Indonesia
description: Carved in volcanic stone is a standing figure wearing a floor-length skirt and elaborate jewelry at the waist, neck, and armbands. On the head is a crown, from which curled hair drapes down past the shoulders. The right arm is raised and broken at the forearm, while the left is down and across the body, broken at the wrist. A circular banner of sculls drapes across one shoulder and loops across the right hip before snaking up the back to join itself.
rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection, Formerly in The AMICO Library
meta.Alt Text: Carved in volcanic stone is a standing figure wearing a floor-length skirt and elaborate jewelry and a crown. The arms are broken. A banner of sculls drapes across the chest.
meta.Location: Current: Museum of Fine Arts Boston, Boston, MA, USA
meta.Rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection, Formerly in The AMICO Library
meta.Subject: Hinduism

label: Bi -- Ritual Disc Neolithic
description: A Bi, a jade ritual disc, 16.8 cm in diameter with a circular hole in the middle
meta.Alt Text: A jade ritual disc has a circular hole in the middle
meta.Subject: Liangzhu culture

label: Bi -- Ritual Disc with Two Dragons
description: A Bi, a flat jade ritual disc with a circular hole in the middle.  Its surface is carved with a repeating curled shape, and the outer rim on each side shows profiles of two undulating dragons.
meta.Alt Text: A  jade ritual disc with a circular hole in the middle is flanked by two dragons.
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Warring States Period
meta.Subject: grain pattern, dragon

label: Bialucha: Saint Michael’s Cathedral
description: Two square bell towers topped by cone-shaped roofs and crosses at their peaks rise above the triple-gallery façade of this cream-colored cathedral.  Arched windows and a stained-glass rose window adorn the upper galleries.  A portal with a pier and arched tympanum is at the street level.
meta.Alt Text: A cathedral with two square bell towers shows arched windows and a rose window.
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Foreign Missionary Occupations, neo-Romanesque
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Bianzhong of Marquis Yi of Zeng
description: The set 64 of bianzhongs (bells) are hung on two three-level wooden racks that are perpendicular to each other.
meta.Alt Text: A group of 64 bronze bells of different sizes dangle from three tiers of wooden beams.
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Warring State Period
meta.Measurements: Two perpendicular racks; one is 7.48 x 2.65 m; the other is 3.35 x 2.73 m
meta.Subject: musical instrument, ritual bronze

label: Bierstadt: A Storm in the Rocky Mountains, Mt. Rosalie
description: View from a deep river valley in the Rocky Mountains of dark storm clouds gathering over Mount Rosalie.
meta.Alt Text: Storm clouds gathering over Mount Rosalie
meta.Style Period: 19th Century CE, Hudson River School, Romanticism
meta.Subject: landscape, mountain

label: Bierstadt: The Last of the Buffalo
description: This large-scale oil-on-canvas painting measures around six by ten feet. In the middleground of the landscape, a figure, wearing a feathered headdress, rides in on a horse. The rider pulls the reigns on the horse back as he raises a spear at a buffalo who is impaled with arrows and is charging at him. Further in the background of the landscape, other figures ride in on horseback and buffalos roam freely. In the foreground, a group of buffalo lie on the ground injured with skulls around them.
meta.Alt Text: A male wearing a headdress on a horse raises his spear at a buffalo that is charging at him.
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington D.C., United States
meta.Style Period: 19th Century CE, Hudson River School, Romanticism
meta.Subject: landscape, American western

label: Bihzad: The Seduction of Yusuf, folio 52 verso of the Bustan
description: An illustrated house with four floors and a balcony shows some exterior surfaces and two exterior turrets, and some views of interior rooms including a staircase.  Two human figures in an upper room, one chasing the other, wear robes.
rights: Artstor: Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: A house with four stories shows a staircase and two figures in robes, one chasing the other.
meta.Material: opaque watercolor, ink, and gold on paper
meta.Rights: Artstor: Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Subject: Muslim, Yusuf

label: Bisj Pole
description: Carved from a single trunk of a mango tree, the basic form of the bisj pole is an openwork sculptural column with an enlarged wing shape at the top.  People and animals each stand on the shoulders of one below.
meta.Alt Text: A carved pole showing standing human and animal figures.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Subject: Asmat

label: Bison Licking its Flank
description: A crude antler carving of a bison, turning its head back to lick its back. Fur around the head is suggested by lines carved in the antler. The eye, nose, and tongue are clearly distinguishable.
meta.Alt Text: A relief carving of a bison, turning its head back to lick its back.
meta.Location: Current: National Museum of Prehistory in Les Eyzies-de-Tayac-Sireuil
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Abri de la Madeleine near Tursac in Dordogne, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Pre-Historical, Paleolithic
meta.Subject: bison

label: Black Hat -- Joseon Dynasty
description: This tall black hat with a broad circular brim is made of woven horsehair
rights: ArtStor Courtesy UBC Museum of Anthropology, Vancouver, Canada, Derek Tan
meta.Alt Text: Tall black hat with a broad circular brim made of woven horsehair
meta.Location: Current: Museum of Anthropology,  University of British Columbia, BC, Canada
meta.Material: horse hair, silk fibre, dye, bamboo grass, lacquer
meta.Rights: ArtStor Courtesy UBC Museum of Anthropology, Vancouver, Canada, Derek Tan
meta.Subject: Chosun Dynasty, hat

label: Blake: “Holy Thursday” from Songs of Experience
description: This printed and hand-colored page from Songs of Innocence and Experience presents Blake’s poem “Holy Thursday” below an image of a woman dressed in a white gown looking down at a dead baby lying on the ground. Leafless limbs of a tree spread out against a reddish orange sky, and the thick trunk of the tree on the right side of the sheet of paper leads the eye to more images of mothers and suffering and/or dying children. To the right of the second verse of the poem stands a small woman, head buried in hands, and in the bottom right corner we see another infant, this one foreshortened and on his back with head near the viewer, arms outstretched on either side of his head, and knees bent awkwardly. Vines snake though the poetry, contrasting with the dismal scenes depicted.
meta.Alt Text: A woman stands next to a tree trunk looking at a child on the ground nearby.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Material: color-printed relief etching with watercolor on moderately thick, slightly textured, cream wove paper
meta.Measurements: Sheet: 18.4 x 12.1 cm; Plate: 11.4 x 7.3 cm
meta.Subject: trees, poetry

label: Blake: Ancient of Days
description: A nude, muscular man colored in tones of grayish-brown crouches, left knee up and the right down, within a sun-like disk surrounded by dark and ominous clouds; his long hair is swept to the left side of the image as if by a forceful primordial wind. His right arm, vertically bisecting the image, leads the viewer’s eye from the central circle of yellowish orange to the huge open arms of the compass held in his right hand that dominates the darkness below.
meta.Alt Text: A bearded man crouches in a sun disk surrounded by clouds, reaching down with a compass.
meta.Location: Current: Fitzwilliam Museum, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Subject: Urizen, poetry

label: Blake: First Book of Urizen
description: This color-printed relief etching on moderately thick, slightly textured, cream wove paper shows the title of Blake’s text enclosed by the brown bending limbs of a tree whose brown trunk is on the left of the image. Below the title is an old bearded man, knees drawn so high up against his face that his right foot peeks out through his beard. His eyes are closed, and he is writing with both hands, which are extended to his sides. The figure is rendered in grays and cream colors, and behind him is what looks like a grey stone tablet or grave marker, while under him is an object that looks like an open book. Publication information appears below the figure.
meta.Alt Text: Under a leafless tree a man with a white beard squats, writing with both hands on either side of him.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Material: color-printed relief etching in orange-brown with watercolor on moderately thick, slightly textured, cream wove paper
meta.Measurements: Sheet: 30.2 cm x 24.4 cm; Plate: 15.2 cm x 10.5 cm
meta.Subject: Urizen, literary theme

label: Blake: The Great Red Dragon and the Woman Clothed in Sun
description: A watercolor on paper illustration shows the back of a standing figure with human legs, a serpent's tail, two fan-shaped wings, and a head with curled horns and a crown. In front of him, a woman clothed in swirling yellow fabrics lies on the ground with her arms upraised, a fan of yellow hair surrounding her head.  She is looking with an alarmed expression up at the dragon who stands above her.
meta.Alt Text: A dragon with human legs, a tail, and widespread wings stands over a woman wrapped in yellow.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Material: black ink and watercolor over traces of graphite and incised lines on wove paper
meta.Measurements: Image: 43.7 x 34.8 cm; Sheet (with inlay): 55.1 x 43.3 cm
meta.Subject: England, dragon, poetry

label: Bodhisattva Guanyin Seated on Potalaka
description: A carved and painted wooden human figure sits on a rock in a relaxed pose, with one leg bent and propped up on the seat level, resting an extended arm on its knee, while leaning on the other arm.  The figure is dressed in a draped garment and wears jewelry and a cone-shaped crown.
meta.Alt Text: A human figure carved in wood and painted sits on a rock, wearing a loose garment, jewelry, and a crown.
meta.Location: Current: The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, Kansas City, Kansas, USA
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Liao or Jin Dynasty, Buddhist
meta.Material: wood with multiple layers of paint
meta.Style Period: 12th Century CE, Liao or Jin Dynasty
meta.Subject: Guanyin Bodhisattva

label: Bodhisattva in The Abeyadana Temple
description: This watercolor wall painting in the Abeyadana Temple depicts a bodhisattva in an exaggerated contrapposto pose, holding a sword and wearing a kilt, a short-sleeved cropped shirt, and a helmet-shaped crown. The figure is yellow against a black and red ground. Growing at the feet and along the sides of the figure are lotus motifs.
meta.Alt Text: A bodhisattva holds a sword, wearing a kilt, a short-sleeved cropped shirt, and a helmet-shaped crown. TGrowing at the feet and along the sides of the figure are lotus motifs.
meta.Cultural Context: Southeast Asian, Myanmar, Burmese Hindu, Burmese Buddhist
meta.Subject: Gautama Buddha

label: Bodhisattva Padmapani, detail of a wall painting
description: A fresco painting shows a life-sized rendering of the torso and head of a Bodhisattva, shirtless, wrapped in garments at the hip, gazing to the left, holding a lotus blossom in the right hand. Two locks of dark curly hair drape on the shoulders. On the head sits a magnificent cone-shaped crown. The eyes are lowered. Surrounding the figure are crowds of musicians, monkeys, and devotees of both elite and non-elite social status.
meta.Alt Text: A frescoed painting shows a life-sized rendering of the torso and head of a figure wearing jewels and a crown.
meta.Subject: Bodhisattva Padmapani

label: Bodmer: Portrait of Péhriska-Rúhpa
description: This is a hand-colored engraving of a painting that depicts a dancing man, who wears a crown of feathers and a turkey tail.  Around his neck are beads and a long-stemmed war whistle.  With a rattle-stick in one hand, and a bow-and-arrows in the other, his leggings and moccasins show elaborate quillwork and fringe.  His face is painted.
meta.Alt Text: A Native American man dances in an elaborate headdress and leggings.
meta.Location: Current: Library of Congress, Washington DC USA
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Fort McKenzie, Upper Missouri River, North America
meta.Subject: Péhriska-Rúhpa

label: Bonampak Mural showing ritual bloodletting
description: A frescoed wall painting in room 3 of the Mayan Temple at Bonampak shows 3 seated female figures of equal size, piercing their tongues with stingray spines in a bloodletting ritual. In front of them, a kneeling male offers supplies. On the ceiling above, surrounded by yellow, another supernatural entity appears to spew blood.
meta.Alt Text: Three seated female figures show pierced tongues with stingray spines, while male kneeling figures offer supplies
meta.Subject: Maya

label: Bonheur: Ploughing in the Nivernais
description: A dozen oxen -- two teams of six pulling plows -- begin the first ploughing of soil in early autumn to allow for aeration of the soil during the winter. Farmers wearing hats guide the oxen from behind plows using reins, or with sticks from the sides.
meta.Alt Text: Oxen begin the first ploughing in autumn as farmers guide them through the field.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Realism, Social Realism
meta.Subject: agriculture, genre

label: Bonheur: The Horse Fair
description: Dozens of men are leading and riding horses on the Boulevard de l’Hôpital towards Paris’ horse market near the Salpêtrière.  Trees and a dome-shaped building are in the background.
meta.Alt Text: Men are leading and riding horses for a market in an open street.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Realism, Social Realism
meta.Subject: horse, genre

label: Book of Kells
description: An illustration in the book of the enthroned Christ with the Four evangelists at his feet.
meta.Alt Text: An illustration in the book of the enthroned Christ with the Four evangelists at his feet.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Christendom, Insular
meta.Subject: gospel book

label: Borobudur Panel
description: This rectangular panel shows in stone carved relief a seated pair in the center, raised on a canopied pedestal. Both wear crowns. Nine seated figures in a row line up under umbrella-shaped trees.
meta.Alt Text: This rectangular panel shows in stone carved relief a seated pair in the center, raised on a canopied pedestal. Both wear crowns. Nine seated figures in a row line up under umbrella-shaped trees.
meta.Cultural Context: Southeast Asian, Indonesian, Buddhist, Shailendra dynasty
meta.Subject: Shailendra dynasty, rulers

label: Borobudur: Buddhist Temple
description: A large stone building is festooned with arched niches that line several layers of stacked platforms.  A dome shape is visible at the top.
meta.Alt Text: A step pyramid.
meta.Cultural Context: Southeast Asian, Indonesian, Buddhist, Shailendra dynasty
meta.Subject: Shailendra dynasty, Buddhism

label: Bosch: The Garden of Earthly Delights
description: Thee panels show three landscapes, populated with people and animals.  On the right and in the center, the fields are green, and there are ponds in them.  On the right, the landscape is darker, and monsters and musical instruments appear in it.
meta.Alt Text: Three panels show on the left the Garden of Eden, in the center many nude people riding animals and frolicking with fruit, and on the right hell, with monsters and torture.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, Netherlandish, Northern Renaissance
meta.Subject: Christianity, Eden

label: Boston Hunting Carpet
description: A red border with seated and standing male figures surrounds a golden carpet with hunting scenes, and a central medallion depicting combat between a dragon and a phoenix.

label: Botticelli: Birth of Venus
description: This painting shows Venus, nude, emerging full-grown from the sea on a clam shell; a personification of spring approaches her with a robe while the West Wind (Zephyrus) and a nymph blow flowers in her path.
meta.Alt Text: Painting showing Venus emerging from the sea, attended by mythological figures.
meta.Subject: Venus, Aphrodite

label: Botticelli: Judith and Holofernes
description: Tempera and oil painting of the Biblical hero Judith holding aloft the head of the tyrant Holofernes, a sword in her right hand
meta.Alt Text: Tempera and oil painting of the Biblical hero Judith holding aloft the head of Holofernes, a sword in her right hand.
meta.Subject: Judith

label: Botticelli: La Primavera (Spring)
description: This painting shows Venus at the center of a group of mythological figures in a lush, spring landscape.
meta.Alt Text: Painting showing Venus at the center of a group of mythological figures in a lush, spring landscape.
meta.Subject: Flora, Venus, Cupid, Mercury

label: Botticelli: Portrait of Dante Alighieri
description: This profile portrait (drawn from sources, not life) is of the poet Dante Alighieri.
meta.Alt Text: Profile portrait (drawn from sources, not life) of the poet Dante Alighieri.
meta.Subject: Dante Alighieri

label: Botticelli: The Annunciation
description: This tempera painting is of the Angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Christ child; both are shown in an architectural setting.
meta.Alt Text: Tempera painting of the Angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Christ child.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: Annunciation, Gabriel, St Mary

label: Botticelli: Venus and Mars
description: This painting shows the satyr companions of Venus bearing away the arms of Mars, fast asleep after a session of love-making
meta.Alt Text: Painting showing the satyr companions of Venus bearing away the arms of Mars, fast asleep after a session of love-making.
meta.Subject: Venus, Mars

label: Boucher: Rape of Europa
description: This oil-on-canvas painting is also often called "The Abduction of Europa". A woman, Europa, sits atop a bull while many figures lie around her. Cherubs fly around the scene in the air. Boucher depicts a mythological scene from Ovid's "Metamorphoses" where Jupiter/Zeus, who disguised himself as a bull, attempts to abduct Europa. This however is a flowery portrayal of a rather violent myth.
meta.Alt Text: A woman sits atop a bull on the edge of a flowery shore.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: Jupiter

label: Boucher: The Arts and Sciences: Architecture and Chemistry
description: This is an oil-on-canvas painting with two separate scenes. The top register of this work depicts a young child outdoors drafting or drawing an architectural plan. The lower register depicts another young child indoors where its science experiment has gone wrong and is lit on fire. Flowery embellishments and a small landscape separate the two registers.
meta.Alt Text: A child at a table draws in a drafting book while another raises its arms.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: personifications, children

label: Boucher: The Arts and Sciences: Comedy and Tragedy
description: This oil-on-canvas painting shows two separate scenes. The top register of this work is the title's Comedy scene, depicting a young child sitting outside holding a mirror and a theatrical mask. The lower register is the title's Tragedy scene, showing another young child with a mythical creature at her side. Floral embellishments and a small landscape separate the two registers.
meta.Alt Text: A child sits holding a mirror, mask, and books while another falls with a dragon-creature.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: personifications, children

label: Boucher: The Four Seasons: Autumn
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the season of Autumn. A woman sits perched on a tree in an area of the forest. Her hat sits perfectly on her head as a man leans over her to hand her grapes. Their lavish clothes are indicative of the fashion of the time.
meta.Alt Text: A woman sits on a tree while a man offers bunch of grapes. A basket of fruit sits on the ground.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: Rococo, seasons

label: Boucher: The Four Seasons: Spring
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the season of Spring. A male youth places flowers into a young girl's hair. They are dressed elegantly and sit in a lush secluded garden overlooking a small residence.
meta.Alt Text: A young man puts flowers into the hair of a young woman. A goat stands next to them.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: Rococo, seasons

label: Boucher: The Four Seasons: Summer
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the season of Summer. Here, three figures bathe nude near a stone fountain. They wrap themselves lightly with luxurious fabrics and sit in the center of a lush forest area.
meta.Alt Text: Three nude figures lay at the base of a stone fountain.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: Rococo, seasons

label: Boucher: The Four Seasons: Winter
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the season of Winter. A man pushes a woman through the snow in an elaborate sleigh. They are both dressed in luxurious clothing. However, the womans chest is exposed as she stares at the viewer with a smirk. The dark, quiet, snowy landscape is very different from Boucher's usual lush and playful scenery.
meta.Alt Text: A woman sits in a sleigh while a man  pushes her from behind through the snow.
meta.Location: Current: The Frick Collection, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Subject: Rococo, seasons

label: Boucher: The Toilette of Venus
description: A painted oil-on-canvas portrayal of the goddess Venus with cupids, also known as cherubs or puti, around her. The decoration is luxurious and elegant with the mixture of fabric, flowers, and pearls throughout.
rights: Public Domain Metropolitan Museum of Art
meta.Alt Text: A woman sits in the nude on luxurious fabrics with young cherubs all around her.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Rights: Public Domain Metropolitan Museum of Art
meta.Subject: Venus, cupid

label: Boucher: Virgin and Child with a Rose
description: This oval oil-on-canvas painting is held in a rectangular frame. This work depicts a young woman, presumably the Virgin Mary, holding a child, which is likely a naturalistic representation of Jesus. They are both enwrapped in multitudes of draped fabrics of different colors. The child is holding a rose.
rights: Artstor: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco
meta.Alt Text: A woman holds a child. A child holds a rose up.
meta.Location: Current: Fine Arts Museum of San Francisco - Legion of Honor, California, United States
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Rococo
meta.Rights: Artstor: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco
meta.Subject: St Mary, Jesus

label: Bound Nubian Prisoner
description: Soft limestone figure of a bound prisoner with an elongated torso. Kneeling, with arms pulled behind his back, the figure looks forward from under a carved rounded wig.
meta.Alt Text: Soft Limestone figure of a bound Nubian prisoner
meta.Subject: nubian, prisoner

label: Bowl with Kufic Inscription
description: A shallow white bowl shows Arabic script written around the rim. A black dot appears in the center.
meta.Alt Text: A shallow white bowl shows Arabic script written around the rim. A black dot appears in the center.
meta.Location: Current: Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn, New York, USA
meta.Material: ceramic; earthenware, painted in brown slip on a white slip ground under a transparent glaze
meta.Subject: Arabic calligraphy

label: Boyle and Kent: Chiswick House
description: This is a large white Neo-Palladian villa that has a stone façade. In the center are six Corinthian columns that support a pediment that is largely without ornamentation. Above that is a windowed octagonal dome. On either side of the columns are symmetrical windows below which staircases lead up to the second story.
meta.Alt Text: A large white villa with a double staircase leading up to a covered porch and a dome for a roof.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, British, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: English garden, neo-Palladian

label: Brancusi: Bird in Space
description: This is a gently curving polished bronze sculpture in the shape of a column, thinner at the base than at the top.  The title hints at what the shape resembles: a large feather standing upright, or perhaps a slender abstraction in the shape of a heron, with head down and tail in the air. The highly polished surface conveys a luminous golden appearance that contrasts with the rounded limestone pedestal, also sculpted by the artist, which is a creamy beige color.
rights: ArtStor: Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: A feather-shaped object made of polished bronze is rooted to the floor by a round limestone base.
meta.Location: Current: MoMA (Museum of Modern Art), New York City
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Minimalism, Modernism
meta.Rights: ArtStor: Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Subject: birds, minimalism

label: Braque: Bottle and Fishes (Bouteille et Poissons)
description: A bottle just left of center is next to some fish, all of which rest on a diagonally oriented table on whose left side a drawer is opened; all objects in this work are painted in oil on canvas with a palette of bluish-grays and brown-tans.  The fragmented shapes, partly revealed in geometric squares, are highly stylized and fragmented, thus making it very difficult to immediately comprehend.
meta.Alt Text: Multiple squares contain parts of a bottle, a fish, a table, and an open drawer.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Cubism, Modernism
meta.Subject: still life, cubism

label: Breuer: Wassily Chair
description: This photograph shows four identical chairs, all made from tubular steel and strips of black fabric that form the seats and the backs and covers the arms of the chairs. The graceful curves of the steel frames of the chairs complement the rectangular strips of fabric. Behind the chairs is a window with a view of a glass-walled building.
meta.Alt Text: Four identical cube-shaped chairs are made of steel tubes and black squares of fabric.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, German, Bauhaus, Modernism
meta.Subject: Bauhaus, furniture

label: Broederlam: Annunciation from Retable de Champmol, Crucifixion Altarpiece
description: A  woman in a blue robe sits in a porch next to a building with one hand on a book. She turns to look at a kneeling angel in a red robe outside the room, who holds a ribbon with words on it.  A bearded male in the sky above the building extends a tube of gold from his mouth that filters through the window above the woman's head as rays of light reaching to her halo.  To the viewer's right is a mountain with a castle on top, at the foot of which two pregnant women stand in a partial embrace, one wearing a  hooded blue robe and the other in a green cloak over a red robe and a white wimple.
meta.Alt Text: A Woman sits with an angel figure kneeling next to her. To the right, two women talk. They are in an outdoor scenery.
meta.Location: Current: Musée des Beaux Arts, Dijon, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, French, Christendom
meta.Subject: Annunciation

label: Bruegel: Children's Games
description: This oil painting is of children and adults engaged in a variety of rugged games.
meta.Alt Text: Oil painting of children and adults engaged in a variety of rugged games.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Netherlandish, Northern Renaissance
meta.Subject: children

label: Bruegel: Landscape with the Fall of Icarus
description: This oil painting is of a ploughman on a hill overlooking the sea, where ships are sailing and the legs of Icarus can be made out disappearing into the water.
meta.Alt Text: Oil painting of a ploughman on a hill overlooking the sea; the legs of Icarus can be made out disappearing into the water.
meta.Location: Current: Royal Museum of Fine Arts of Belgium, Brussels, Belgium
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Netherlandish, Northern Renaissance
meta.Material: oil on canvas mounted on wood
meta.Subject: landscape

label: Bruegel: Peasant Dance

label: Brunelleschi: The Sacrifice of Isaac -- detail from Baptistery Doors
description: A bronze high relief shows a central kneeling figure on a platform, wearing a loincloth, with hands tied behind. Holding a knife to his neck is a bearded man in a robe. A winged figure on the left holds the man's arm, stopping the action. A ram in profile turns its head next to Isaac’s knee. Below and in the foreground are two robed seated figures and a saddled horse grazing.
meta.Alt Text: A bearded main in a robe holds a knife to the throat of a kneeling bound male. A winged figure on the left stops the action.
meta.Subject: Issac, Abraham

label: Buddha Protected By a Naga
description: The photo shows a statue of the upper torso of a golden Buddha statue, wearing a cone-shaped headpiece that rises to a flame-shaped tip. Fanned behind the figure and rising over the head to shield him from the elements are seven snakes, arranged side-by-side, with their mouths open to revel fangs, and wearing stylized crowns.
meta.Alt Text: The upper torso of a golden Buddha statue wears a crown. Fanned behind the figure and rising over him are seven snakes, side-by-side, showing fangs and wearing stylized crowns.
meta.Location: Current: Wat Phra That Doi Suthep Temple, Chiang Mai Province, Thailand
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Wat Phra That Doi Suthep Temple, Chiang Mai Province, Thailand
meta.Subject: Buddha, Naga

label: Buddha Seated on Lion Throne -- Mathura
description: A carved stone Buddha is seated in a yogic pose with right hand raised and left hand on his knee. A shawl drapes over his left shoulder and arm. He sits on a dais with three lions — one facing the viewer, and two in profile on either side — supporting it from beneath. Two figures in contrapposto poses stand behind the Buddha, flanking it, and two appear to be flying above the halo disk that is behind his head.
rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: Stone Buddha seated on a throne with images of three lions.
meta.Rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Subject: Buddha, lion

label: Buddha Seated on the Coils of a Naga
description: This Buddha is made of bronze and sits on a platform made of snake-shaped coils. In a classic Asana posture, both hands join and fingers interlace below the navel. The figure sits upright, has a narrow waist, and wears jewelry at the wrists, ankles, biceps, and ears. A wide banded crown encircles the head, rising in a cone shape above.
meta.Alt Text: This bronze Buddha sits on snake coils, upright with a narrow waist, wearing bands or jewelry at the wrists, ankles, biceps, and ears. A cone shaped crown is on his head.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: Buddha, Naga

label: Buddhas of Bamiyan
description: In side by side photographs, the same cave is shown on the left with a statue of a standing Buddha in it, and on the right without a statue in it.
meta.Alt Text: The same cave is shown twice, one with a standing Buddha in it, and the other without it.

label: Bull-Leaping fresco
description: Fresco depicting a large brown bull and three athletes–two women and one man. All three figures wear loincloths and boots. A female figure with white skin holds the bull’s horns, while a male figure with brown skin is depicted in mid-vault over the bull, and the third, a woman with white skin, stands with arms out, poised to catch the jumper. The fresco has a decorative border. The background is rendered in cerulean blue. The border is rendered in several shades of blue, brown, ochre, and white. In this image, surviving fragments of the fresco are placed on a wall that is painted to fill in the gaps.
rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: Fresco depicting a large brown bull and three athletes--two women and one man
meta.Material: stucco panel with scene in relief
meta.Rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Subject: bull

label: Bull-Man Wrestling Eshnunna
description: A terracotta relief sculpture shows a male standing figure grasping a tiger with both hands, who stands opposite and equally as tall. The male figure’s lower body resemble a bull’s rear legs and tail, while the tiger’s legs resemble a man’s feet. The male figure’s torso and head are human, and he faces the viewer, showing a beard and a cone-shaped headpiece.
meta.Alt Text: terracotta relief sculpture shows a male standing figure grasping a tiger with both hands
meta.Measurements: Height: 10.2 cm; Width: 7.2 cm; Depth: 1.3 cm
meta.Subject: bull-man, lion

label: Bull's head rhyton
description: Carved stone bull’s head pitcher with incised designs and gilded horns. Inlaid eyes with painted lashes. There is a hole in the neck and another in the snout. Naturalistic.
meta.Alt Text: Carved stone bull's head pitcher with incised designs and gilded horns.
meta.Subject: ritual vessel, bull

label: Burne-Jones: Fair Rosamund and Queen Eleanor
description: In mixed media on paper, two figures face each other.  A crowned, dark-haired woman wearing a red robe fastened at the throat leans toward a light-haired woman in a red floor-length dress on the right, who shrinks back.  They seem too large for the enclosed interior space that contains them.  The tiled floor creates a shallow depth of field, a narrow space.  A table with basins and vessels on it and under it separates the two figures, as does the mirror with multiple spherical reflective surfaces on the wall above it. The crowned woman holds a skein of yarn in one hand, from which a long strand loops to the floor and is tied to a doorknob on the left. A hand mirror lies on the ground at the feet of the woman on the right.
meta.Alt Text: Two women stand facing each other with a table between them, both dressed in red robes.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Pre-Raphaelite
meta.Subject: Rosamund Clifford, Queen Elanor

label: Burne-Jones: The Beguiling of Merlin
description: Before a flowering tree, a young woman (Nimue) holding a book looks back over her shoulder at a recumbent Merlin, the sorcerer who brought about the reign of King Arthur.
meta.Alt Text: A young woman looks back over her shoulder at an older, reclining man
meta.Location: Current: Lady Lever Art Gallery, Liverpool, UK
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Pre-Raphaelite
meta.Subject: Arthurian, Merlin

label: Buson: Autumn Landscape
description: In soft tones, the painting depicts a lyrical, blustery scene of trees on a weather-worn mountain. In the background, two conical peaks rise.  In the blank sky above, ownership seals and writing appear.
meta.Alt Text: A mountainside covered with windswept trees.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA

label: Bust of Akhenaten
description: The head of a human carved in stone wears a crown that flares wider at the top rim than at the headband; above the flared rim rises a cylinder topped by a dome.  The eyes and eyebrows are almond-shaped and reach to the temples; the nose is straight until the nostrils, where the nasolabial furrows extend to the corners of the lips.  A square chin-beard extends from the chin.
rights: CC BY 2.0 Paul Mannix; Original uploader was Muntuwandi at en.wikipedia -- Flickr Transferred from en.wikipedia
meta.Alt Text: Pharaoh Akhenaten's head with elongated features.
meta.Rights: CC BY 2.0 Paul Mannix; Original uploader was Muntuwandi at en.wikipedia -- Flickr Transferred from en.wikipedia
meta.Subject: Amunhotep IV, Akhenaten

label: Bust of Nefertiti (front)
description: A female head, neck, and parts of the shoulders is molded in painted plaster, adorned with a cylinder-shaped crown that flares wider at the top than at the headband.  Painted dark blue, the crown shows a multi-colored band encircling its middle, and on the front, rising from the forehead, is a vertical line with two loops. The face is symmetrical and painted reddish brown.  The lips are painted red. Two ears on each side, one slightly damaged; one eye is missing an insert. Around the neck and shoulders is a painted necklace.
rights: GNU Free Documentation License Magnus Manske
meta.Alt Text: Carved in granite, a human head is adorned with a cylindrical crown. The chin and ear are broken.
meta.Rights: GNU Free Documentation License Magnus Manske
meta.Subject: Nefertiti

description: A carved marble statue of a nude bearded man holding a calf draped over his shoulders with both hands clasping the calf's legs. Both the man's legs are broken and missing at the knee, and his left thigh is damaged. Braids drape down to his shoulders and span his forehead, and his eyes are open. A slight smile is on his lips.

label: Cameron:  The Parting of Lancelot and Guinevere
description: This is an albumen-silver photograph depicting two figures in a somber embrace. Based on the title, the bearded man dressed in chainmail armour is meant to represent Lancelot, who was King Arthur's best friend in Arthurian legends, and the woman in a white gown, holding his hand in one of hers, his glove in the other, represents Guinevere, King Arthur's wife.
rights: Public Domain Metropolitan Museum of Art

label: Cameron: St Agnes
description: This is an albumen-silver photograph which depicts a full-length portrait of a woman. She wears a long white gown, a crown, and holds a rod of wheat. The title "St Agnes" may refer to the venerated virgin martyr, Saint Agnes, who is the patron saint of girls and chastity. She is often depicted as a young woman in loose robes and holding a palm branch as the model, Alice Liddell, is in this photograph.
meta.Alt Text: A standing woman wears a crown and white dress.  She holds wheat in her hand.
meta.Location: Current: Art Gallery of South Australia, Adelaide, Australia

The handwritten inscription on the bottom reads (from left to right) "From Life", "Julia Margaret Cameron" ,"The Mountain Nymph Sweet Liberty".
rights: Public Domain Metropolitan Museum of Art

label: Campin: Merode Annunciation Triptych (Campin Altarpiece)
description: This triptych oil painting on wood shows a man and woman kneeling in a courtyard outside the door of a Flemish interior in the left-hand panel, a winged angel (Gabriel) leaning toward a woman (the Virgin Mary) who leans sitting against a long bench, reading a book she has wrapped in cloth. A small figure carrying a crucifix rides into the room on a beam of light. In the right panel, an older man at work table (Joseph) operates a hand-drill. Through the window behind him, one sees a town square surrounded by buildings.
meta.Alt Text: Triptych the Annunciation, donors, and a view of a Flemish town.
meta.Location: Current: Cloisters, Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Netherlandish, Northern Renaissance
meta.Measurements:
Overall (open): 64.5 x 117.8 cm
Central panel: 64.1 x 63.2 cm
each wing: 64.5 x 27.3 cm

label: Caravaggio: The Calling of Saint Matthew
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the moment in which Jesus essentially inspires Matthew to follow him. Here we see several armed men and a boy, all dressed in sumptuous garments contemporary to Caravaggio's time, clustered around a table counting money. Jesus appears at the viewer's right, marked by a halo. He points softly towards a figure in the group.
meta.Alt Text: Many figures sitting at a table as a ray of light comes in through the window. A man is standing and pointing.

meta.Alt Text: A toga-wearing young male holds bunches of grapes near his mouth, glancing at the viewer over his right shoulder. On a table by his elbow is a pair of peaches and vine leaves.
meta.Subject: Dionysus, Bacchus

label: Caribou and Walrus Mask
description: This is a red and white mask that is divided in half: one side shows the face of a walrus and the other a caribou. Two antlers crown one side, and one tusk emerges from the snout of the other. Red paint covers the walrus side, where a round eye-hole encircled by white paint is echoed by painted white dots, implying speckles.  Wood pegs bristle from the snout, implying whiskers, and a long dagger-shaped tooth points down from the jaw. The caribou side is painted white with black lines to emphasize the nostril.  The mouth snarls and is painted red, showing four fang-shaped teeth.
meta.Alt Text: A painted wooden mask resembles a caribou head on one side and a walrus head on the other.
meta.Location: Current: National Museum of the American Indian, Washington DC, USA
meta.Subject: caribou, walrus

label: Carracci: Christ and Samaritan Woman
description: A painting shows a woman and a man in robes near a well, with ropes and jars at their feet. Nearby five men watch and gossip while looking at the pair. A town and some buildings are in the distance.
meta.Alt Text: A woman stands and a man sits near a well. Nearby five men watch and gossip while looking at them. A town is in the distance.
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Carracci: Loves of the Gods ceiling fresco
description: A barrel-vaulted ceiling in the main receiving room of the Palazzo Farnese in Rome is painted with more than a dozen scenes from Greek and Roman mythologies. Painted frames create the illusion of an elevated art gallery, and painted medallions between the frames appear as sculpted bronze reliefs. 10 scenes radiate around a single central panel that shows a triumphal procession of gods in chariots, walking, riding, and flying in a natural setting.
meta.Alt Text: A barrel vaulted ceiling is painted with numerous scenes from Greek and Roman mythology. Each scene is surrounded by painted frames.
meta.Subject: Greek mythology

A palette with smears of paint on it dangles from a peg on the easel, and a small pet peers at the viewer from in front of an empty cushioned chair.
rights: Artstor NYU Dept of Art History Digital Collections

label: Cézanne: The Large Bathers
description: More than a dozen nude people gather in front of two clusters of tree trunks that rise on either side.  Most of the people gaze toward the water in the background.  One leans up against a tree trunk. A woman in the center can be seen crouching to spread a blanket, helped by two others opposite.  Above the heads of the group, between the tree trunks, can be seen a body of water with a swimmer in it, and a bank opposite, where more people are standing.  A town is visible on the horizon, with a blue sky above.
meta.Alt Text: Several nude women interact next to trees and a lake.
meta.Location: Current: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, PA USA

label: Chacmool from Chichén Itzá
description: A half-reclining male figure carved in stone lies on his back with knees bent and feet on the floor. Seen from the side, he turns his head to face the viewer. He hold a flat dish on his belly with his hands, and his elbows support his torso in a half-seated posture. Seen from the side, he turns his head to face the viewer. A chest ornament carved in relief -- two bars and a pyramid shape -- hangs from his neck, and bracelets are carved into his wrists. He wears sandals and leggings, but is otherwise nude. A cylinder-shaped headpiece with carved pebble-shapes on it wraps around his head, and two rectangle shapes inscribed with hieroglyphs cover each ear. The eyes are almond-shaped with winged brows above them, and the irises are denoted with carved dots. The mouth is open, revealing teeth.
meta.Alt Text: A half-reclining male figure carved in stone rests on his elbows with knees bent and feet on the floor. A flat dish is on his belly.
meta.Location: Current: Museo Nacional Antropologico, Mexico City, Mexico
meta.Subject: Maya

label: Chagall: The Cat Transformed into a Woman
description: A woman with a feline head who is dressed in a blouse and a skirt leans on the table to her left, hands folded and looking at the viewer; the incline of the upper part of her body creates a strong diagonal that moves from the lower left to the upper right of the image.
meta.Alt Text: A woman's body with a cat's head in a dress sits at a table.
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington, DC, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Modernism

label: Chagall: The Dance and the Circus
description: This is a brilliantly colored oil-on-canvas painting, with a vibrant yellow ground. Two larger figures dominate the scene, with smaller figures around them.  A bull-headed human dressed in circus clothing, with a red head and legs, plays a violin. A woman dressed in green whose long hair is blue extends her arm with a bouquet of flowers toward the violin-player. A smaller nude woman embraces a man’s head, who cradles her from behind.  A seated woman holding a painter's palette and brushes holds a purple chicken by the neck. Other small figures dance in a circle near the bottom of the canvas, with a hint of windowed buildings among them.  A bowl of fish can be seen behind the violin-player, and butterflies flutter around its head. Chagall’s signature appears near the bottom.
meta.Alt Text: Against a yellow backdrop, a woman offers flowers to bull-headed human who plays the violin.
meta.Location: Current: Musée National d'Art Moderne, Centre Georges Pompidou, Paris, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Modernism
meta.Subject: dancers

label: Chakalte' Relief with Enthroned Ruler
description: Carved in relief on stone is a square scene showing three figures: on the right is a seated figure, facing the viewer. Traces of pigment show the decorated platform under him was painted in vivid red, turquoise, and yellow or white. Two standing figures on the left face the seated figure, offering tribute items in outstretched hands. All three figures are dressed in jewels, necklaces, bracelets, headdresses and robes. Hieroglyphs appear above the seated figure and the larger of the two standing figures.
meta.Alt Text: A seated figure on a throne faces the viewer. Two standing figures on the left face the seated figure, offering tribute items in outstretched hands.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: Maya, ruler

label: Chardin: The Young Schoolmistress
description: This oil on canvas portrait shows a young child being taught by an older girl. This is likely a private lesson despite the painting's title.
meta.Alt Text: A young child sits at a table and an older girl teaches them.
meta.Location: Current: The National Gallery, London, United Kingdom
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Genre painting
meta.Subject: children, education

label: Chartres -- Central Bay
description: The tympanum of the central portal on the west façade of Chartres Cathedral, shows a large figure of Christ with a nimbus enthroned in a mandorla; he is surrounded by the symbols of the four evangelists (clockwise from the upper left, the angel = Matthew; the eagle = John; the winged Ox = Luke; and the winged lion = Mark). Below Christ is a row of smaller figures in niches on the lintel (each shown full-length); similar figures are carved in the three archivolts around the tympanum.
meta.Alt Text: The tympanum of the central portal on the west facade of Chartres Cathedral, showing a large figure of Christ.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic
meta.Measurements:

Height of south-west tower: 105 metres (344 ft)
Height of north-west tower: 113 metres (371 ft)
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Chartres -- South Portal Redeemed Souls
description: Small sculptured figures stand  in niches of five nested archivolts; the figures represent redeemed souls at the last judgment. In the lower set of niches, souls are shown as naked infants being embraced by winged angels, some individually, some in groups; two of the infant souls wear crowns. The higher row of niches in the image shows clusters of souls, naked from the waist up, their hands clasped in prayer. They turn their heads toward the center tympanum.
meta.Alt Text: Small sculptured figures of redeemed souls at the Last Judgment, from Chartres Cathedral.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic

label: Chartres -- South Rose Window
description: This large set of stained glass windows is in the predominant colors of red, blue, purple, green, yellow, and brown. Above a row of five lancet shaped windows showing the Virgin Mary (center) flanked by the Four Evangelists and prophets from the Hebrew Bible, there is a large circular window. At its center, in a round frame, is an image of Jesus making a gesture of blessing; concentric rows of round frames surround Jesus; the first shows angels and the Four Evangelists; the second and third show the Elders of the Apocalypse. Four-lobed decorative forms are interspersed between the second and third rows, and many circular embellishments accompany each of the roundels in which the images are inscribed.
meta.Alt Text: Large set of stained glass windows from Chartres Cathedral showing Biblical scenes and figures.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic

label: Chartres -- View from Southeast
description: A view of Chartres Cathedral from the southwest, showing how it rises above the structures around it. Flying buttresses can be seen supporting the walls of the choir (in the foreground); the middle of the image shows the apse, with a large rose window on its south façade; behind this, one sees the flying buttresses that support the nave, with the north and south towers in the upper and lower left of the image, respectively.
meta.Alt Text: A view of Chartre Cathedral from the southwest; flying buttresses can be seen supporting the walls of the choir and nave.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic

meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Chartres -- Window Notre Dame de la belle verrière
description: Lancet-shaped stained glass window in the predominant colors of red, purple, blue, white and brown are separated into 22 square frames by black bars; the four top center frames show the Virgin Mary with Christ posed on her lap, looking straight at the viewer; the Holy Spirit in the shape of a dove hovers above them. Nine rectangular frames in rows of three on the bottom of the window show scenes from the life of Christ; a row of three frames showing angels is directly below the Virgin and Child, who are flanked by six frames showing angels.
meta.Alt Text: Lancet-shaped stained glass window from Chartres Cathedral.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Gothic

label: Chauvet Cave Paintings
description: Drawings of lions on a cave wall. The drawings suggest the lions are running.
meta.Alt Text: Drawings of lions on a cave wall. The drawings suggest the lions are running.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Pre-historical, Paleolithic

label: Cheekpiece from a Horse Bit showing a crowned human figure gripping two griffins
description: This bronze relief shows a human figure, crowned and bearded, facing the viewer, standing on two dead rabbits, and gripping the forelegs of two winged griffins on either side with his hands, who face the viewer with open, fanged mouths.
meta.Alt Text: Bronze relief of a human figure, crowned and bearded, facing the viewer, standing on two dead rabbits.
meta.Location: Current: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
meta.Subject: Luristan bronze

label: Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus Railway Station
description: A large U-shaped building is festooned with dome, turrets, pointed arches, and ornaments.  A central tower topped with a dome and a clock are flanked on each side by colonnades and arched loggia.
meta.Alt Text: A large building decorated with columns, turrets, domes, and loggia features a clock tower.
meta.Subject: Gothic Revival, colonial

label: Christ as the Good Shepherd
description: A shepherd dressed in a tunic stands with a sheep draped across his shoulders. He grips the lamb’s forelegs and hind legs with each hand. He wears leggings and sandals, and a bag hangs from a belt draped across his right shoulder and chest. The youth tilts his head slightly to the left. The sheep, whose wool is carved in rosettes of symmetrical rows, has turned its head backward, looking at its tail.
meta.Alt Text: A shepherd dressed in a tunic stands with a sheep draped across his shoulders.
meta.Cultural Context: Ancient Roman, Christian Roman, Imperial Roman, Late Antiquity
meta.Subject: Christ, lamb

label: Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion, rebuilt by Emperor Fasilides
description: A large rectangular building made of stone rests on a three-tiered pediment. Round-topped stone battlements line the roof. Three large arches span the short side of the building. Over the center arch rises a crown-shaped structure from the roofline. On the long side of the building are one tall square-topped doorway, two small arched doorways, and three arched windows.
meta.Alt Text: A large rectangular building made of stone shows round-topped stone battlements on the roofline. Three large arches span the short side of the building.
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Church of Sant Vicenç of Cardona
description: The Church of Sant Vicenç of Cardona is on a hill, with a clear view of its general exterior design, including the apse.
meta.Alt Text: The Church of Sant Vicenç of Cardona on a hill, with a clear view of its general exterior design, including the apse.
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Church of St George, roof
description: This is a ground-level view of the roof of the Bete Gyrgios (Church of St. George) showing the cross pattern of the rock-hewn building and its symmetrical design. A cross is incised into the roof to bring out the pattern more clearly.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO Author: Francesco Bandarin
meta.Alt Text: Ground-level view of the roof of the Bete Gyrgios (Church of St. George) showing the cross pattern of the rock-hewn building.
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO Author: Francesco Bandarin
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Church of St George, walls and base
description: This three story church is carved from solid rock, sunken into the ground so that its roof is parallel with the surrounding land. The church is built in the form of a cross with four equal-length arms, standing on a stone plinth. A stone staircase leads up to the main entrance, a rectangular portal inset between framing post and lintel forms; smaller rectangular portals appear on the other arms, with rectangular window-like niches on the walls. On the third story, each wall has one window set in an onion-like arch.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO Author: Francesco Bandarin
meta.Alt Text: Rock-hewn church in the form of a cross, sunken into the ground so that its roof is parallel with the surrounding land.
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © UNESCO Author: Francesco Bandarin
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Church: Heart of the Andes
description: View of a mountain in the Andes, a waterfall in the right-center foreground; tiny human figures in the left foreground establish scale

label: Church: Niagara Falls, from the American Side

label: Claude Lorrain: Harbour at Sunrise
description: This oil painting is of an imagined Italian harbor; in the foreground are workers and small boats, while the background shows the sun rising over the sea, framed by larger ships, a medieval tower, and a classical Roman arch.
meta.Alt Text: Oil painting of an imagined Italian harbor, showing workers and small boats, larger ships, a medieval tower, and a classical Roman arch.

label: Claude Lorrain: Jacob with Laban and His Daughters
description: This oil painting is of Jacob negotiating with Laban over his daughters, Leah and Rachel; they stand by a herd of sheep amid an Italian landscape that dwarfs them.
meta.Alt Text: Oil painting of Jacob negotiating with Laban over his daughters amid an Italian landscape.

label: Claude Lorrain: The Judgment of Paris
description: This oil painting shows a small cluster of figures in the foreground who represent the story of the Judgment of Paris; they stand in an extensive imaginary landscape modeled on the Italian countryside.
meta.Alt Text: Oil painting showing the Judgment of Paris, set in an imaginary landscape modeled on the Italian countryside.

label: Claude Lorrian: View of La Crescenza
description: This oil painting shows a castle in the distance, amid a landscape of the countryside surrounding Rome.
