label: Cleomenes: Aphrodite (Medici Venus)
description: This carved stone statue of a female nude with wavy hair tied in a loose bun stands in a contrapposto pose, sheliding her breasts and pubis with her arms and hands as she looks toward her left. On the ground next to her left foot is a dolphin with a nude winged child on its back.
meta.Alt Text: Statue of a female figure using her arms to cover her breast and lower body with puti and fish figures at her feet.
meta.Subject: Venus, Aphrodite

label: Cliff Palace Mesa Verde Ancient Puebloan
description: Three towers linked by rock walls and supported by tiered rooms below are built under an overhanging south-facing cliff that shelters from the sky the ruins of this Ancient Puebloan city.
meta.Alt Text: Three towers are linked by rock walls and supported by tiered rooms below. Above looms an overhanging cliff that shields the city from rain.
meta.Measurements: Tallest tower is 7.9 m, reconstructed height
meta.Subject: Ancestral Puebloan

label: Close: Self-Portrait
description: This work uses a somber palette of grays and browns to fill in a grid of squares with organic shapes resembling lozenges, donuts, and hot dogs. Together the shapes form a recognizable, head–and–shoulders portrait of the artist.
rights: ArtStor: University of California, San Diego
meta.Alt Text: A face made up of grey and black grids of circles looks at the viewer.
meta.Location: Current: MoMA (Museum of Modern Art), New York City
meta.Rights: ArtStor: University of California, San Diego
meta.Subject: self portrait

label: Coatlicue
description: A statue with a monstrous face with fangs at the top, a skull against spider-shaped hands in the middle, and writhing snakes covering the skirt/legs at the bottom.  The suggestions of a throne and a seated figure imply royalty or a deity.
meta.Alt Text: A monster sits on a throne, with writhing snakes below.
meta.Location: Current: National Museum of Anthropology, Mexico City, Mexico
meta.Subject: Aztec

label: Codex Borgia page 28
description: On a square sheet of velum, four rectangular quadrants are drawn, with a fifth in the center of the page. Each quadrant contains drawn and painted illustrations of a male hovering above a female. Each female wears an elaborate headdress but is otherwise naked. Each male is positioned in profile, with an open fanged mouth and a headdress identifying the deity he represents. All five male-female couples appear amid maize, an important Mesoamerican plant. Below each compartment are three rectangles each containing a glyph that identifies the date.
rights: © Foundation for the Advancement of Mesoamerican Studies, Inc.
meta.Alt Text: Four boxed figures surround a central boxed figure. All five boxes show a male hovering above a female in an elaborate headdress.
meta.Measurements: Folded into 39 sheets. Each sheet is 27 x 27 cm, for a total length of nearly 11 m.
meta.Rights: © Foundation for the Advancement of Mesoamerican Studies, Inc.
meta.Subject: Aztec

label: Codex Mendoza - The Founding of Tenochtitlán
description: A rectangular page shows 51 square blue Aztec hieroglyphs framing the edges of the page. Two illustrated boxes appear inside the frame. The top box shows an eagle with wings outspread clutching a flowering cactus in its talons, bisected by an X-shape that shows in its four quadrants 10 human heads and torsos, each one labeled and shown in profile, along with plants and buildings. In the bottom box four warriors battle with spears and shields, while two small buildings appear on the right, one of them burning.
meta.Alt Text: On a square manuscript page, an eagle stands on a cactus growing in a lake. A box painted around it shows many seated figures in profile.
meta.Subject: Aztec

label: Cole: Imaginary Scene from The Last of the Mohicans: Cora Kneeling at the Feet of Tamenund
description: View of a rugged landscape in the Hudson River Valley, with tiny human figures enacting a scene from James Fenimore Cooper's novel The Last of the Mohicans to show scale.
meta.Alt Text: View of a rugged landscape in the Hudson River Valley
meta.Subject: Mohican, landscape

label: Colossal Statue of King Aspelta
description: The granite gneiss statue is over 10 ft tall and wears royal kilt and headdress. The king is in the striding position with one leg forward. Arms are held rigidly by the side. A long inscription runs down the back.
rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection
meta.Alt Text: A larger-than-life stone male figure wears a royal kilt and headdress, with one leg forward.

label: Constable: Mary Freer
description: This is an oil-on-canvas portrait of a young person with dark brown hair and rosy cheeks; her whitish skin and white short-sleeved dress are offset by the dark background.  The red of the coat and the golden hues of her hat, both held in her lap, complement the other hues. She looks directly at the viewer, and her expression is serious, perhaps tinged with melancholy.
meta.Alt Text: A portrait of a brown-haired girl in a white dress, who holds a red coat and a gold hat in her lap.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Subject: portrait

label: Constable: Somerset House Terrace from Waterloo Bridge
description: Constable uses oil on canvas to illustrate a long ornate building on the left of the canvas at a strong diagonal, bringing the eye to the blurry cathedral dome that rises above the background cityscape and to the grey arched bridge that bisects the right side of the canvas. In the foreground, dots and lines of color represent boats on the greenish-grey water, and a blue-grey sky creates a heavy, chill effect.
meta.Alt Text: A building near a harbor with boats in it.  A cathedral and a blue sky are in the background.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Subject: riverbank, cityscape

label: Constable: The Hay Wain
description: In the foreground, a small black and white dog looks at three horses who have stopped pulling their cart in a river that winds into the middle ground field and background row of trees; on the left is a cottage, and the blue and white of the sky dominates on the right side of the canvas.
meta.Alt Text: A team of horses pulls a wagon through a stream next to a house and a hayfield.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Subject: landscape

label: Copán Ballcourt
description: An aerial view of a T-shaped grassy playing field flanked by three masonry structures. The two long sides of the playing field, forming the stem of the T, are flanked by two walls with horizontal, vertical, and sloping surfaces. Across the top of the T-shaped playing field is a tiered structure that could have been used for audience seating. On top of all three structures are temple-shaped ruined structures.
rights: CC BY-SA 2.0 Original image by Adalberto Hernandez Vega
meta.Alt Text: An aerial view of a T-shaped grassy playing field flanked by three masonry structures. Walls flank both sides of the long axis, while across the top are ruins of stadium seating.
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 2.0 Original image by Adalberto Hernandez Vega
meta.Subject: ball court

label: Copley: The Death of Major Peirson, 6 January 1781
description: Large canvas showing a stricken British officer being carried off by his men while others engage the enemy in battle.
meta.Alt Text: Painting of the death of a British officer
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Neoclassicism, History Painting
meta.Subject: Major Francis Peirson

label: Copley: Watson and the Shark
description: This painting in oil on canvas shows a stormy sea, upon which is a rowboat next to a nude male in the water about to be attacked by a shark.  Two men reach from the boat to rescue the swimmer, while others row with the oars.  Two men stand in the bow of the boat, one with a spear-hook aimed at the shark, the other holding a rope that has been thrown to the swimmer.  Behind this dramatic scene are moored ships in a harbor, and the towers of a city. All gazes are directed toward the crisis in the water, and all faces register a range of intense expressions. Two from the boat are just about to save the boy by reaching his outstretched hand. The pyramidal composition of the men in the boat complements the horizontal lines created by the boy’s naked body and the huge gray shark in the greenish water as well as the serene background coastline.
meta.Alt Text: A rowboat on stormy waters is next to a nude man who is about to be attacked by a shark.
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington, DC, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Neoclassicism, History Painting
meta.Subject: Brook Watson

description: A nude hero wearing a belt and conical plumed cap stands between two lions, holding one upside down by its tail. To the right is a smaller scene of a griffin attacking a stag. A double-headed eagle hovers between the two scenes and, at the same level, another smaller nude belted hero is flanked by dogs.
meta.Alt Text: A nude hero wearing a belt and conical plumed cap stands between two lions, holding one upside down.
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, USA

label: Cylinder seal -- royal worshiper before a god on a throne; human-headed bulls below
description: A carved cylinder seal with a modern impression showing a worshiper offering a caprid to a seated figure. Between them are a winged rosette disk with crescent, two stars, a squatting monkey, and an ankh, or a so-called Egyptian cross.
meta.Alt Text: A carved cylinder seal  showing a worshiper offering a caprid to a seated figure.

label: Cylinder seal and modern impression: demons and animals
description: This seal shows an elaborate many-figured design. Two demonic lion-headed creatures, known as Minoan Genii, face one another, holding vessels by the handles. They stand on the backs of confronted lions, with heads of horned animals. Above them, between a small leaping ibex and crossed lions, signs of the Cypro-Minoan script flank a central rosette over a winged sun disc. A second group is composed of two figures grasping a lion suspended between them, one by the tail and the other by the hind leg. One figure wears a knobbed cap and a belted flounced garment, while the other is a bull-headed demon. Approaching the scene is an upright human-headed lion.
meta.Alt Text: cylinder seal and impression of demons and animals
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, USA
meta.Subject: demons, animals

label: Cyrus Cylinder Seal front side
description: A clay cylinder, inscribed with Babylonian letters
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum

meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum

label: Dalí: Crucifixion (Corpus Hypercubus)
description: This oil on canvas painting shows a depiction of Christ’s crucifixion.  It employs dramatic lighting and two-point perspective to show two figures: one stands in flowing robes on the ground on the lower left of the canvas looking up toward the second figure of Christ crucified on a cross that hangs in the air, not touching the ground. This “crucifix” is actually composed of golden cubes that are repeated in four smaller cubes in front of Christ and the squares on the ground upon which the female devotional figure (likely Mary Magdalene) stands. While Christ’s face is turned away from the viewer and his body floats in front of the cross, the tensed fingers of both hands suggest martyrdom, and the gestures are emphasized by the shadows they cast on the crucifix. Below, a checkered floor improbably provides a second linear perspective pointing to the mountains on the left in the background, in this scene of dark browns and brilliant yellow-gold, leading the eye to the glimmer of light along what looks like a distant coastline.
rights: ArtStor:  © 2019 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
meta.Alt Text: A nude man hangs from a floating cross while a robe-wrapped woman on the ground watches.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Surrealism, Modernism
meta.Rights: ArtStor:  © 2019 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Dalí: The Persistence of Memory
description: A Surrealist landscape in oil on canvas shows a body of water and a jagged coastline in the background.  A cube, a platform, an upright dead branch, and a walrus-shaped object on the sand.  Four pocket watches are distributed in this scene, three of them with their faces visible and draped, as if they are melting, over other features of the landscape. The closed orange-gold watch on the lower left is covered with ants, and on the blue face of the watch, behind it, is a fly whose shadow is also visible. An unnatural light illuminates the background of water and sky, putting the foreground into shadow. A strange creature—part fish, part human being, part shell?—is in the central foreground, one of the watches draped over it.
meta.Alt Text: Four pocket watches are on a beach with an ocean and cliffs in the background.
meta.Location: Current: MoMA (Museum of Modern Art), New York City
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Surrealism, Modernism
meta.Subject: Surrealist landscape

label: Dance Mask of the Tunghat
description: This mask is a spirit or dance mask. One elongated seal-shape forms an arching brow above the eyes, and across the nose drapes another seal-shape.  The lower part of the face resembles a walrus. Above the brow are small canoe-shaped boats with humans in them.
meta.Alt Text: A mask made of wood resembles a walrus.
meta.Location: Current: Peabody Museum at Harvard University, Cambridge, MA, USA
meta.Subject: dance mask

description: Painting of the Great Indian Fruit Bat, positioned to show anatomical detail

label: Daumier: Rue Transnonain, le 15 Avril, 1834
description: Bright light draws the eye to a dead man, dressed in a blood-stained nightshirt, whose body lies sprawled, head resting against the side of his bed, in the center of the image. Around his body is an overturned chair and two other figures, also lying on the bloody floor: the head of a man on the right and the feet of a figure in the background on the left. Perhaps most horrifying is the fact that the central figure has collapsed on top of a fallen child, whose bloody head and arms stick out from beneath that murdered man.
meta.Alt Text: A dead body lies in a pool of blood in a bedroom, with other bodies around it.
meta.Location: Current: Art Institute of Chicago, Chicago, IL, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Social Realism, Realism
meta.Material: lithograph in black on grayish-ivory China paper laid down on ivory wove paper
meta.Subject: corpse

label: Daumier: Third-Class Carriage
description: Dark oils used on this canvas in shades of brown and beige outline a woman holding an infant, an older woman holding a basket on her lap and a boy leaning on her, asleep, with his hand on a box next to him.  All are seated on a bench facing the viewer.  Behind them are fellow travelers on other benches on this dark and dreary train carriage.  Some wear hats and scarves; their faces are barely visible and most of them seem to be peasants like the figures in the foreground.  Silhouetted against a window on the left is the profile of a man wearing a top hat.
meta.Alt Text: Two women, one with an infant and the other next to a sleeping boy sit on a bench in a train car with other travelers behind them.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Social Realism, Realism
meta.Subject: travelers

label: David: Death of Marat (Marat assassiné)
description: A man with a turban lies dead in his bathtub, his left hand, further from the viewer, holding a piece of paper, and his closer right arm dangling down toward the floor; in front of him, near his feet is a box on which lie writing implements and on the side of which is his name.
meta.Alt Text: A man in a turban is in a bathtub, holding a paper in one hand.
meta.Location: Current: Musées Royaux des Beaux-Arts/Old Masters Museum, Brussels, Belgium
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: Jean-Paul Marat

label: David: Death of Socrates
description: A group of anguished men in togas and draped sheets surrounds a bed in a dark interior space illuminated only partially by a tall lamp. A man in a red tunic, head averted and back turned toward the viewer, holds out a cup to the white-haired bearded man who sits upon the bed in the center of the painting.  As he accepts the cup with one hand, he points an index finger upward with the other. At the foot of the bed sits a man dressed in a gray robe, head bowed in grief.  On the floor next to him is a scroll and a chain with open shackles. Light illuminates the central heroic figure but the others are shadowed in muted colors and posed into contorted shapes implying shame, grief, or shock. In the background on the left, beyond an arch, we see three small figures; they seem to have recently left the scene. One looks back and waves.
meta.Alt Text: A dozen toga-wearing men surround a white-haired bearded man who sits in a bed.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism, History Painting
meta.Subject: Socrates

label: David: Napoleon Crossing the Alps
description: On a large oil-on-canvas painting, a soldier sits on a rearing white horse as the winds blow back both the horse’s cream-colored mane and the golden cloak of the man atop the horse, who also wears a bicorn hat. The figure of the horse forms a diagonal that moves across the canvas from the upper left to the lower right; behind it, the mountains in the distance follow the diagonal line of the horse’s body. Below the body of the horse, members of the army can be seen moving uphill, some pushing a wheeled vehicle. In the foreground, the names “Bonaparte,” “Hannibal,” and “Karolus Magnus” are carved on rocks on the ground, telling the viewer that this general is indeed Napoleon, which makes the painting a depiction of his crossing the Alps with his troops. The rocks in the foreground echo the light beige of the horse, and the mountains and sky are bluish white, with touches of gold where the sun shines through the clouds.
meta.Alt Text: A horse rears on a mountainside, mounted by a French officer with a billowing cape.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: Napoleon Bonaparte

label: David: Napoleon in his Study
description: In a rectangular oil-on-canvas full-length portrait, Napoleon stands facing the viewer in a contrapposto pose, left foot slightly forward, and with his right hand tucked into his military uniform; behind him are a desk piled with papers and a clock.
meta.Alt Text: A uniformed man stands next to a chair in front of a desk with his hand tucked into his vest.
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington, DC, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: Napoleon Bonaparte

label: David: Oath of the Horatii
description: This life-size oil-on-canvas painting depicts three men on the left standing and saluting three swords held by another man in the center of the painting while off to the right are seated grieving women and some children; the background is classical, with the arcade and floor tiles framing the subjects and providing depth.
meta.Alt Text: Soldiers in togas salute a man holding three swords. Seated women grieve behind them.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism, History Painting
meta.Subject: Horatii family

label: David: The Coronation of Napoleon
description: This huge canvas depicts in oil paint from a diagonal perspective an altar of a dimly lit church that is filled with people dressed in sumptuous clothing primarily white, gold, and red. At the center, a woman kneels on a pillow at the foot of the altar steps; she is about to be crowned by a man, already wearing a crown of golden laurel, who stands above her with a crown held high to the viewer’s right. Between them, one sees, among the onlookers, clerical figures, recognizable by their opulent gold and white attire, mitered hats, and the presence of a crucifix; other onlookers include soldiers, identifiable by their white-plumed hats.
meta.Alt Text: A queen kneels on a pillow while a priest puts a crown on hear head.  Hundreds watch.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: Napoleon Bonaparte

label: David: The Intervention of the Sabine Women
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts the legendary incident between the Sabines and the Romans. This hectic scene shows women on the ground protecting children, grabbing onto soldiers' legs, and raising their children in the air. Two nude soldiers raise their spears, about to attack each other. One woman stands defiantly in the center with her arms outspread while wearing all white.
meta.Alt Text: Soldiers raise their spears. Women cling onto their children. One woman in white stands.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism, History Painting
meta.Subject: Roman mythology

label: de Chirico: Love Song
description: This painting, which seems flat despite its use of linear perspective, presents an array of objects whose relation to each other is far from clear. Against a central greenish-brown wall, we see a white sculptural bust that is classical in style, next to which a red rubber glove is pinned. In front of both objects is a green ball that casts a shadow. In the background on the left side of the canvas is a brick wall with smokestacks atop it, and on the right of the canvas is a bluish-grey and beige arcade. The sky behind is bright blue.
meta.Alt Text: Next to a building is a green wall with a rubber glove and a Roman-style bust over a green ball.
meta.Location: Current: MoMA (Museum of Modern Art), New York City
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Surrealism, Modernism
meta.Subject: Surrealist landscape

label: de la Tour: Penitent Magdalen

He holds a staff in the right hand, with his left hand on his hip. He wears robe tied at the shoulder, sandals tied with red ribbons, and a cloth headdress. A shield emits smoke in the background.

label: Degas: The Dance Class
description: Painted in oil on canvas, a scene of a dance studio full of costumed ballerinas in various poses of dance and repose. A large square mirror on a long sea-green wall, as well as diminishing sizes of dancers, creates an impression of deep perspective. At the back of the room are raised seats for observers.  The dancers’ white tutus and skin tones stand out against the muted tones on the floorboards and the wall. A music stand, beside which a cello lies on its side, occupies the lower left foreground of the image, while a white-haired dance master dressed in a white suit stands in the middle ground on the right, leaning on his staff, watching one of his students perform.
meta.Alt Text: A dance studio full of ballerinas in tutus shows musical instruments.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Impressionism

label: Delacroix: Massacre at Chios
description: A large oil-on-canvas painting shows a war scene.  A dozen dead, dying, and submissive prisoners are arranged across the foreground. A turbaned guard with a sword stands behind them.  Another turbaned man on a rearing horse on the right draws his sword while two women struggle against them. In the background is a skirmish involving horses, rifles, and swords.  In the deep background a city burns on a peninsula extending out into the ocean.
meta.Alt Text: War scene that depicts the destruction on the Island of Chios in the Chios massacre
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Romanticism, Orientalism

label: Delauney: Paysage au disque
description: The upper portion of this oil-on-canvas rectangle is dominated by concentric circles of rectangular tiles of color, primarily purple and rose, with some greens, surrounding a white dot. These tiles suggest light emanating from the orb of the sun; below and to the left, blue and green mosaics suggest the sea, which is balanced by dark purples and greens that represent trees. In the foreground are flowers, constructed in the same manner with similar colors, but we also see a burgundy-colored flower in the central foreground.
meta.Alt Text: A sunrise over a seascape and landscape, with purple and green mosaic effect in paint.
meta.Location: Current: Musée national d'art modern, Centre Georges Pompidou, Paris, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Post-Impressionism, Orphism, Modernism
meta.Subject: landscape

label: Derain: Baigneuses (Esquisse)
description: The thick oil paint on this canvas depicts five women bathing in a river, their bodies nearly filling the canvas. They are faceless, and their bodies are composed of long arcs and curves accentuated by shading. The river in which they bathe is a light blue column in the middle of the painting that extends from the top to the bottom of the work. There is no effort to represent space mimetically; the figures and the space they occupy all seem flat. The colors used for the bodies are flesh tones tinged with orange, and the background on either side of the river is dark blue, green, and orange.
meta.Alt Text: Five faceless human shapes bathe in a river.
meta.Location: Current: Musée d'Art Moderne de la Ville de Paris, France
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Fauvism, Modernism
meta.Subject: bathers

label: Double-Sided Gospel Leaf, Obverse, Tigray
description: This parchment leaf is painted with tempera (primarily blue, red, and gold), showing a fountain underneath a stone canopy; on either side of the canopy roof sits a large bird resembling a peacock, each in turn flanked by a small bird. At ground level, a pair of gazelles flank the fountain. An inscription in Ge'ez identifies the birds and the animals, and describes the fountain as the Fountain of Life.
meta.Alt Text: Parchment leaf painted with tempera, showing the Fountain of Life underneath a stone canopy.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Double-Sided Gospel Leaf, Reverse, Tigray
description: This parchment leaf is painted with tempera (primarily blue, red, and gold), showing the Crucifixion as if taking place in an interior space between two columns. The central cross is stylized; there is no body crucified on it, but a lamb stands on its top, eyes open. On either side of the central cross is a man tied to a cross, staring straight ahead from the picture space. Two smaller figures flank the cross, gesturing toward it. Four abstracted plant-stalks grow out of a stylized semi-circular roof, each with a bird dipping its beak into a flower at its end.
meta.Alt Text: A painting of a gospel scene on parchment
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: Ethiopian Christianity

label: Douglas: The Judgement Day
description: This oil-on-canvas painting depicts a man holding a key in his left hand and playing a trumpet. The man is intended to represent the archangel Gabriel. He stands planted on two half-circular figures representing earth and sea. Four figures stand behind him, some with their arms raised and others kneeling. The original image was painted in a mix of pastel greens and purples.
rights: Artstor University of California, San Diego
meta.Alt Text: A man holds a key and plays a trumpet into the air. Four figures stand behind him.
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington D.C., United States
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Harlem, New York City, New York, United States
meta.Rights: Artstor University of California, San Diego
meta.Subject: Gabriel

label: Doura-Europos Synagogue
description: Stone walls in ruins show a courtyard of a rectangular shape with partial pillars and doorways. Behind is a flat stone wall.
meta.Alt Text: Stone walls in ruins show a couryard of a rectangular shape with partial pillars and doorways.
meta.Subject: Syria

label: Dream of Queen Maya
description: Relief panel in stone (schist), probably originally part of the decoration on a temple. It shows Queen Maya, mother of the Buddha, reclining on her side, accompanied by standing attendants. Descending toward her is a small elephant with a halo behind it, representing the Bodhisattva who impregnates her in her dream.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Alt Text: Relief sculpture of a woman laying down, surrounded by figures.
meta.Cultural Context: South Asian, Pakistani, Buddhist, Gandhara, Hellenistic
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Subject: Queen Maya, elephant

label: Duchamp: Fountain
description: This is a black and white photograph of a white porcelain urinal that has been placed on a pedestal, and tilted on its back, so viewers see into its bowl and drain in reverse from the expected view.  On the left lower edge of the urinal is a bold black signature, “R. Mutt,” underneath which is the date “1917.”
meta.Agent: Marcel Duchamp, photograph by Alfred Stieglitz
meta.Alt Text: A porcelain urinal is displayed on a pedestal.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Subject: urinal, readymade

label: Duchamp: Nude Descending a Staircase
description: The oil-on-canvas painting, composed primarily of ochre, beige, and brown cylinders and cones, appears to show a figure moving through a sequence of superimposed images that suggest movement from the upper left of the canvas toward the lower right. While there are suggestions of legs, hips, torso, and head, there is no clearly discernible integrated form, yet the impression is strong that this is a human figure descending toward the viewer, a reading of the work confirmed by the handwritten caption on the lower left of the canvas that reads, “Nue descendant un escalier.”
meta.Alt Text: A staircase is painted with multiple versions of a figure walking down it.
meta.Location: Current: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, PA, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Cubism, Modernism
meta.Subject: Cubism

label: Durbar of Jahangir
description: Across the top third of the page, nine robed figures wearing turbans stand or sit on a balcony. Two of them are children. The figure in the center sits under a temple-and-pillar structure, a ring of light surrounding his head. The bottom two-thirds of the painting shows a crowd of figures, all shown in profile wearing turbans, a horse, and an elephant.
meta.Alt Text: A crowd of admirers greets a king
meta.Location: Current: Museum of Fine Arts Boston, Boston, MA, USA
meta.Material: ink, color, gold and silver on paper
meta.Subject: Mughal Darbar

label: Dürer: Adam and Eve
description: Adam and Eve stand on either side of the Tree of Knowledge of Good and Evil. Eve’s hand is outstretched to take the fruit which the serpent (wound around the tree) is offering her. Other animals are shown in the background. Dürer's signature is depicted as hanging from a tag on a tree in the background.
meta.Alt Text: Adam and Eve stand on either side of the Tree of Knowledge. Eve reaches to take fruit from the serpent. Other animals are shown in the background.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, German, Northern Renaissance

label: Dürer: Rhinoceros
description: This is a detailed depiction of a rhinoceros in full-body profile. It looks as if the rhinoceros has armored plates on its body.
meta.Alt Text: A detailed depiction of a rhinoceros in full-body profile. It looks as if the rhinoceros has armored plates on its body.

label: Dürer: Self-portrait at the Age of 28
description: The torso of a man is in a brown, fur-lined robe which he clasps with his right hand. He looks directly toward the viewer. He has hazel eyes, is bearded, and has long, light brown hair falling in ringlets around his shoulders.
meta.Alt Text: A self-portrait of the artist
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, German, Northern Renaissance

description: A graytone ink landscape shows mountains and mist.

label: Eakins: The Gross Clinic
description: A grey-haired man in a dark suit stands next to a table where a patient lies unconscious, surrounded by five men who assist in the surgery. The patient's thigh has been cut open. Seated nearby a woman cringes behind her hands, averting her gaze.  Above her is a mustached man seated at a desk.  Above and behind him is a darkened audience of more than a dozen seated observers. The light in the room comes from above and spotlights the wound on the thigh, the surgeon's head, the woman, and the man at the desk.
meta.Alt Text: A man stands to present a surgery performed by a group in front of an audience.
meta.Location: Current: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, PA USA
meta.Subject: group portrait, surgery

label: Early Classic Mayan two piece brazier
description:
This ceramic vessel is in two pieces with red, yellow, and white zig-zag and straight lines around the cover and the base. The cover is shaped into a modeled monkey head with rayed headdress and scroll ear decorations. 
A pastillage appliqué encircles the waist.
rights: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History; photo 2005 by Div. of Anthropology, Yale Peabody Museum
meta.Alt Text: The cover of this two-piece ceramic dish is shaped like a monkey head. Red lines are painted on the base.

label: Earrings -- Three Kingdoms Period
description: A pair of gold earrings are made of two thick loops chained together, from which dangle a small sphere with a beaded ring encircling it. Leaf-shaped trinkets and two gold chains hang from it, at the end of which are a pair of decorated pendants.
meta.Alt Text: A pair of thick gold earrings with three decorated pendants dangling from each.

label: Egyptian Ivory Cosmetic Box
description: A dish-shaped ivory bowl with a flat bottom has two square-shaped drilled handles opposite each other and a flat disk-shaped lid with two drilled tabs in identical positions.  One drilled hole has a peg attaching it to one of the bowl’s handles, allowing it to slide open. The lid is incised with a rosette shape, with a zigzag pattern encircling the rim’s edge.
meta.Alt Text: This small ivory box has a lid that swivels open and closed.
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Subject: rosette, zig-zag pattern

label: Egyptian Jug Decorated with Dolphins & Birds
description: A flat-bottomed wide-bodied jug with one handle and a narrow spout is painted with three arched dolphins and three large birds (possibly geese) above each; a smaller bird is painted below the handle.
meta.Alt Text: Three dolphins move around the foot of the jug, with three large birds above each.

description: The tile is from the palace of Rameses III in Thebes. It shows a Nubian prisoner in profile.
rights: ArtStor Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Collection

label: Egyptian Travelling Boat being Rowed
description: A canoe-shaped flat-bottomed boat, carved from wood, carries two rows of six seated figurines, each holding an oar positioned as if rowing.  A figure stands in the bow, holding a sounding weight, and a figure sits next to a rudder that extends over the stern. All figures wear skirts and have identical black helmet-shaped hair. Covering the rear of the boat is a painted arched tent with a window on the side.  Inside the tent two seated figures face the rowers, one seated on a throne and the other holding a harp. Facing the throne, a figure gestures in prayerful veneration.
meta.Alt Text: Egyptian Travelling Boat being Rowed
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, Fifth Avenue, New York City, USA
meta.Location: Place of Origin: Egypt, Upper Egypt, Thebes, Southern Asasif, Tomb of Meketre
meta.Material: wood, paint, gesso, linen twine and linen fabric
meta.Measurements: L. 128 cm , with rudder 175 cm x W. with oars 30.5 cm x H. 37 cm
meta.Subject: boat

label: Eiffel Tower
description: This is a very tall structure in an open field that towers over the buildings behind it in the photograph. It appears to rest on a huge arch the sloped sides of which rise up and join one another, forming a tall tower. It is constructed of light greenish-brown metal girders that make the support system of the tower immediately visible. The tower seems to be composed of three primary sections: the arched base with a platform at its top; the second tier, a trapezoid that has an observation deck at the top; and the long upward projection that accounts for more than half of the height of the entire monument.
meta.Alt Text: A rocket-shaped steel column rises from four arched pediments.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Industrialism
meta.Subject: Paris

label: Eight-Pointed Star Tile with a Gazelle
description: A star-shaped ceramic tile with eight points is painted with a neutral ground. Outlined in black and running along the outer edges is Arabic script. Inside the band is a painted scene of a running gazelle in front of a vine-and-leaf arabesque motif.
meta.Alt Text: A star-shaped ceramic tile has eight points. Along the outer edges is Arabic script. At the center is a running gazelle in front of a vine-and-leaf arabesque motif.
meta.Material: ceramic; fritware, painted in luster and blue over an opaque white glaze
meta.Subject: Arabic calligraphy

label: El Anatsui: Sasa [Manteau] [Coat]
description: Made out of aluminium and copper wires, this wall-sized curtain is draped vertically and horizontally, showing repeated patterns of bars and dots in various textures and colors like silver, red, and green.
rights: Artstor: UMass Boston, Academic Images, Louise Putnam, personal digital photograph
meta.Alt Text: A wall-sized curtain drapes vertically and on the floor.
meta.Location: Current: Musée National d'Art Moderne, Centre Georges Pompidou, Paris, France

label: El Caracol (Observatory) at Chichén Itzá
description: A round stone structure with a partially ruined domed roof rests on a broad terrace. Four windows in the round walls line up to the cardinal points. This observatory rests on an elevated square terrace. On the north side of the square elevated terrace, a staircase bisected by a doorway leads up to the round structure. Both round and square structures rest on top of a large rectangular terrace with another staircase on the north side. To the right of the second staircase is a lower square terrace where ruins of stone pillars imply a lower square structure.
rights: CC BY-SA 4.0 original by Daniel Schwen
meta.Alt Text: A round stone structure with a partially ruined domed roof rests on a broad terrace. Four windows in the round walls line up to the cardinal points.
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 4.0 original by Daniel Schwen
meta.Subject: Maya

label: El Greco: Christ Driving the Money Changers from the Temple
description: At the center of a crowd in a temple, a male bearded figure in a red robe readies a whip to flail the backside of a figure stooping over a prone terror-stricken woman. All around are men and women in robes trying to flee. The crowd is on a stepped platform, and surrounded by columns and an arched window looking out to a cityscape and clouds under a blue sky.
meta.Alt Text: A painting of the New Testament story in which Jesus drives crowds out of the temple
meta.Location: Current: National Gallery of Art, Washington DC, USA
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: El Greco: Saint Sebastian
description: Two paintings are shown one on top of the other. The top one shows a bound male wearing a loincloth, shot with arrows, leaning against a post and gazing at the cloudy sky that surrounds him. The painting's bottom frame ends at the thighs. The second bottom painting shows the legs from the thighs down to the feet, pierced with an arrow. In the background can be seen a hilltop with a town on it.
meta.Alt Text: A painting of Saint Sebastian in two sections, bisected at the thighs
meta.Subject: St Sebastian

label: El Greco: The Burial of Count Orgaz
description: The top half of this painting shows a domed heavenly scene. Mary in billowing red-and-blue gowns, and Jesus in a loincloth, reach out to each other while an angel floats above them. Crowds of other saints, angels, and historical figures witness the encounter. The bottom half of this painting shows a prone body in a uniform, cradled by two bishops in gold gowns. Crowds of church-affiliated and elite people wearing black and Elizabethan neck-ruffles witness the funeral.
meta.Alt Text: The heavens and the Earth are both depicted in this painting of the burial of a count
meta.Location: Current: Iglesia de Santo Tomé, Toledo, Spain
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: El Greco: View of Toledo
description: A dark landscape painting shows a hill with green fields and roads in the foreground, a town at the top, and a cloudy dark-blue sky above.
meta.Alt Text: A dark landscape painting shows a hill with green fields and roads in the foreground, a town at the top, and a cloudy dark-blue sky above.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Subject: landscape

label: Embroidered Funerary Mantle Paracas Peru
description: On a field of red, eight rows of about ten pairs of shaman figures are embroidered into a rectangular shaped woven mantle. A darker band in a field of green of similar paired figures runs along the two long sides of the rectangle, and partly along the two short sides. Each pair consists of two bodies in profile, crouched as if in a dancing posture, wearing neck-to-thigh flared dresses with a band of colored patterns across the flanks. Each figure holds two sticks, or staffs. The head faces the viewer, showing a toothy grin, a chin-beard, almond-shaped eyes, and a combed upright headpiece. Each figure of each pair mirrors the posture and pose of its opposite/twin.
rights: ArtStor University of California, San Diego
meta.Alt Text: On a field of red, eight rows ten paired figures appear on a red rectangle of cloth.
meta.Material: wool plain weave embroidered with wool
meta.Rights: ArtStor University of California, San Diego
meta.Subject: allover pattern

label: Emperor Xuanzong's Flight to Shu
description: A painting in mostly brown tones illustrates seven horses and attendants on a mountain trail. Two of the horses and their riders are festooned with elaborate pink costumes and carry poles with ribbons dangling from them.
meta.Alt Text: A painting in brown tones illustrates seven horses and attendants on a mountain trail. Two of them are dressed in pink costumes and carry poles with ribbons dangling from them.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Material: hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk
meta.Subject: Tang Xuanzong

label: Enthroned Maya Lord, seated, on a painted vase
description: A painted cylindrical vase shows three figures, two seated and one standing. All three wear elaborate headdresses. Glyphs encircle the outer rim, and drop down horizontally between the figures. Bowls of food appear on the lower register, and two of the figures offer the third bouquets of flowers.
rights: ArtStor University of California, San Diego
meta.Alt Text: A painted cylindrical vase shows three figures, two seated and one standing. All three wear elaborate headdresses. Two of the figures offer the third bouquets of flowers.
meta.Location: Current: Dumbarton Oaks Research Library and Collection, Washington DC, USA

description: An aerial view of the city of Ephesus, showing its large theater in the background. The city was founded by Greeks and later became the Roman capitol of Asia Minor.

label: Ephesus Celsus Library
description: The (reconstructed) facade of the Library at Ephesus was built to honor of the Senator Tiberius Julius Celsus Polemaeanus after his death in about 120 CE. There are four colonnaded niches on the ground floor, each with a statue honoring a Greek virtue in the niche, and three colonnaded windows on a second story.
meta.Alt Text: A ruined building shows a two-story facade with columns and statues.
meta.Cultural Context: Ancient Roman, Roman Asia Minor, Imperial Roman
meta.Measurements: Facade: 69' in length; interior: approx. 2000 square feet

label: Ephesus: Relief of Hermes and his ram
description: A Herm is a ceremonial relief in stone of the Greek god Hermes (Roman Mercury), often used as a boundary marker. This example shows Hermes with his caduceus and winged shoes, guiding a large ram; it stood on Curetes, the street in which the priests of Artemis (the city’s patron deity) lived.
meta.Alt Text: A square flat stone shows a relief carving of a nude man holding a staff, with a ram standing behind him.
meta.Cultural Context: Ancient Roman, Roman Asia Minor, Imperial Roman
meta.Style Period: 2nd Century BCE - 5th Century CE, Imperial Rome
meta.Subject: Imperial Rome

label: Epigonos(?), Dying Gaul, Roman Copy of a Bronze Statue from Pergamon, Turkey
description: A slightly larger than life size Gallic warrior sits on the carved marble ground. His face is contorted in pain from a puncture wound. Rough-tousled hairstyle, a mustache and a necklace identify him as Gaul, or a Celtic warrior.
meta.Alt Text: A slightly larger than life size warrior sits on the carved marble ground with his weapons fallen.

label: Eros Sleeping
description: This bronze statue is of a young child sleeping. The child is likely Eros, also known as Cupid in Roman mythology. His wings lay relaxed behind him as he sleeps on a rock.
meta.Alt Text: An infant sleeps on a rock.

label: Estes: Telephone Booths
description: A glossy, confounding image made in acrylic paint on canvas of a row of four New York telephone booths. The viewer can glimpse a person behind the glass as well as the reflection of people on the street in the metallic booth doors.

label: Ethiopian Healing Scroll from Gondar
description: On a sheet of goat vellum, written letters appear above and below an illustration in the center of a face -- eyes, nose, mouth -- in a red square, which is surrounded by triangular shapes that form an 8-point star, with small loops at the tips. Colors like yellow and purple cover the backgrounds of the geometric shapes, and horizontal registers of interlinked chevron shapes separate the illustration from the written letters.
meta.Alt Text: On a sheet of goat vellum, written letters appear above and below an illustration in the center of a face -- eyes, nose, mouth -- in a red square, surrounded by an 8-point star.

label: Ethiopian Processional Cross
description: This processional cross has a diamond-shaped bronze head; the outer rim is incised with crosses and decorative spirals, while a rectangular center panel is inscribed with images of the twelve apostles, shown as twelve bearded men with a nimbus over the head of each. Each figure is shown from the mid-chest up, as in many portrait busts.
rights: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 © Trustees of the British Museum,

label: Euphronios (Sarpedon) Red-Figure Krater
description: On the side of a vase, six figures are shown in red against a black background. One of them is prone and nude, with bleeding wounds at his chest, abdomen, and thigh.  He is being carried by two crouching figures with wings shown in profile, each wearing a helmet-mask and a beard. Behind them are two standing figures holding shields. In the center, behind the prone body, a robed figure wearing a helmet with wings on it holds a scepter in his left hand while gesturing with his right.
meta.Alt Text: A ceramic vase with two handles rests on a pedestal. A painted scene on the side shows a funeral.

label: Female Dancer -- Han Dynasty
description: A terracotta figure shows a standing woman wearing a floor-length gown that widens at the floor.  Her right sleeve drops from her shoulder to her knee; her left sleeve is draped over her left shoulder, hanging down her back.  Her posture suggests a bent knee and a slight bow at the waist. Remains of paint can be seen: black across her domed head, and red on her dress.
meta.Alt Text: Funereal ceramic figure of a female dancer with watersleeves
meta.Location: Current: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, USA
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Han Dynasty, Western Han

label: Female Figure possibly Olmec
description: A ceramic female figurine with enlarged head, hips, and thighs is nude except for a helmet-shaped headpiece and earspools. The arms are disproportionately short, and taper from the shoulders to the fingertips, which are indicated by scores in the clay. The feet, too, taper to points and lines indicating toes. The face is wide and round, with bulbous slits for eyes, and an open downturned mouth with upper teeth visible.
meta.Alt Text: A ceramic female figurine with enlarged head, hips, and thighs is nude except for a headpiece and earspools.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, NYC
meta.Subject: Olmec

label: Female head ("Lady of Warka") from Uruk (Erech)
description: Carved in stone is a mask of a female face, with vacant almond-shaped eyes, a double-arched incised eyebrow line, a chipped nose, a small unsmiling mouth, and a helmet-shaped head covering.
rights: ArtStor NYU Art History Survey Collection
meta.Alt Text: Carved in stone is a mask of a female face
meta.Rights: ArtStor NYU Art History Survey Collection
meta.Subject: mask, Sumer

label: Fenton: Reclining Odalisque
description: This is a photograph made by the salted paper print technique from a glass negative. It depicts a woman reclining on a Turkish carpet , wearing a tunic over a blouse, and striped dress, and a headscarf with bangles across the forehead. She holds a drum in her lap with one hand, and a fly-whisk in the other. Nearby is another musical instrument, a pitcher vase at her feet, and another object, possibly a water-pipe, near her elbow. Her feet are bare.
meta.Alt Text: A woman, dressed in loose clothing, reclines back on large pillows and holds a drum.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA

label: Frank: Parade, Hoboken, New Jersey
description: The U.S. flag flies between two windows on a brick building. Each window displays a woman standing inside.  A shadow obscures the face of one, and the other is hidden by the flag itself.
rights: ArtStor: University of Florida: Harn Museum of Art
meta.Alt Text: A U.S. flag is on a brick building between two windows, where a woman stands in each.
meta.Location: Current: University of Florida: Harn Museum of Art
meta.Rights: ArtStor: University of Florida: Harn Museum of Art

label: Fresco from the Tomb of the Diver
description: This fresco was done on the walls of a tomb modernly called the "Tomb of the Diver". It depicts a scene from a Symposium, which was a party or gathering of men in Ancient Greece. This detail shows a man embracing a youth, who holds a lyre. On a nearby couch, another man raises a Kylix in tribute.
meta.Alt Text: Five men lie on couches. Two embrace one another as one holds a lyre.
meta.Cultural Context: Southern European, Italian, Ancient Greek, Classical Greek
meta.Subject: symposium

label: Friedrich: Abbey in the Oak Forest
description: Surrounded by leafless trees is the ruin of an abbey, a leaded lancet window framed by heavy masonry. Against the dim light of the setting sun that is most concentrated along the horizon, and the weak moonlight, emerges a procession of monks who carry a coffin into the abbey within which two small lights are visible; some tombstones on either side of the ruin and a cross on the right of the canvas lean crookedly in the ground, indicating that this is a cemetery, and there seems to be a newly dug grave in the foreground. The large building and the trees overshadow the human activity in the center of the scene, creating a feeling of somber melancholy.
meta.Alt Text: Against a twilit sky, leafless trees and a ruined wall with a broken window overshadow a funeral.
meta.Location: Current: Alte Nationalgalerie, Statliche Museum, Berlin, Germany
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: ruins, cemeteries

label: Friedrich: Chalk Cliffs on Rügen
description: The painting uses oil on canvas to depict a view from the chalk cliffs. Two trees frame the scene, with two white chalk cliffs behind them. Between the trees and the cliffs is a view out to sea, where two tiny sails on boats can be seen. There is a woman in a red dress and two men in the foreground. Both the woman and one of the men gaze forward at the view, while the other man looks far down over the edge of the cliff, his hat placed next to him on the grass. The colors are warm and calming.
meta.Alt Text: The painting depicts a view from the chalk cliffs.
meta.Location: Current: Kunst Museum Winterthur | Reinhart am Stadtgarten, Winterthur, Switzerland
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: landscape, cliffs

label: Friedrich: Cloister Cemetery in the Snow
description: Framed between two trees in the foreground are broken down columns. In front of the high columns is a dark entryway made out of brick. Around it are tombstones. The cross-shaped tombstones surround the landscape. The graveyard is surrounded by trees and snow. The artist uses oil on canvas to render this scene.
meta.Alt Text: A cemetery with cross-shaped tombstones, columns and a broken-down brick entryway.
meta.Location: Current: Formerly in Alte Nationalgalerie, Berlin, Germany. Destroyed in 1945
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: ruins, cemeteries

label: Friedrich: Moonrise over the Sea
description: This oil-on-canvas painting shows three people sitting on a large rock watching the moon rise as it reflects onto the dark blue water. There are two ships in the distance. The sky is a mix of dark purple, blue and yellow.
meta.Alt Text: Three people are sitting on the largest rock on the rocky seaside watching the moonrise
meta.Location: Current: State Hermitage Museum, Saint Petersburg, Russia
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: moon, sea

label: Friedrich: Morning Mist in the Mountains
description: Parts of the mountain are visible through the white morning mist that surrounds the whole painting. Green forest trees peek out from the white mist, surrounding the mountain. The rocky top of the mountain stands out from the white and blue mist.
meta.Alt Text: Parts of the mountain are visible through the morning mist that surrounds the whole painting.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: mountain, mist

label: Friedrich: Tetschen Altar (Cross in the Mountains)
description: A silhouette of a crucified Jesus on a tall and thin cross stands on the top of a rocky mountain, surrounded by trees. Rays of sun are shining behind the mountain, lighting up the dark and cloudy sky. An elaborate carved frame, gilded, surrounds the oil-on-canvas painting, showing columns on each side, a triangle-in-a-sunburst at the bottom, and an arched top with five carved cupid heads looking down on the painting.
rights: Artstor: University of California, San Diego
meta.Alt Text: The drawing depicts the silhouette of a crucified Jesus on a cross on a mountain.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Rights: Artstor: University of California, San Diego
meta.Subject: mountain, crucifixion

label: Friedrich: The Sea of Ice
description: This oil-on-canvas painting of a landscape portrays a shipwreck amid icebergs and ice shards. A part of the ship is visible on the right with additional wooden parts of the ship scattered around the scene. More icebergs can be seen in the background with a clear blue sky and light shining right on the wreck.
meta.Alt Text: The painting of a landscape portrays a shipwreck amid icebergs and ice shards.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: glacier, shipwreck

label: Friedrich: Two Men Contemplating the Moon
description: On the left side of this scene, painted in oil on canvas, two men stand on the crest of a small hill with their backs to the viewer.  One drapes his arm over the shoulder of his companion who wears a cape and holds a walking stick.  Together, they look at the vista before them. To their right is a large uprooted tree; its trunk cutting across the canvas and some of its branches blocked from view by the left edge of the painting. Two large rock formations also frame the two men, the tree on the left, and another tree on the right (perhaps a hemlock or spruce?). Other trees form a frame around the men and the sky; it is evening, and the moon is low. The predominant colors are golden browns, and there are touches of lavender in the part of the sky lit by the golden arc of moonlight.
meta.Alt Text: Two men stand with their backs to the viewer in the woods, looking at the moon.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: forest, moon

label: Friedrich: Wanderer above the Sea of Fog
description: With his back to the viewer, a man in a dark suit and a walking stick stands on a rocky peak, overlooking the sea of fog, other nearby peaks, and two distant mountains against a pale blue sky.
meta.Alt Text: A man in a suit stands on a mountain peak looking out over mist and other mountains.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: mountain, mist

label: Friedrich: Woman at a Window
description: Seen from behind, this oil-on-canvas painting shows the back of a young woman who is looking out of a window. Her brown hair is in a tight bun and she is wearing an ankle-length green dress and gold-colored shoes. In the background, outside the window, are tall trees and the mast of a ship with ropes draped from it. There are two bottles on the right side of the window.
meta.Alt Text: A young woman is looking out from a window
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, German, Romanticism
meta.Subject: window

label: Funeral Banner, from Tomb 1 (Tomb of Marquise of Dai)
description: A tunic-shaped funeral banner with human and animal figures.
rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Alt Text: A tunic shaped funeral banner with human and animal figures
meta.Cultural Context: East Asian, Chinese, Han Dynasty, Eastern Han
meta.Rights: ArtStor Department of Art History Digital Collections
meta.Subject: funerary object

label: Fuseli: Study of a Seated Woman
description: This is a sketch done in graphite, pen, gray ink, gray wash, watercolor, gouache and black chalk on paper.  It illustrates a woman wearing an elaborately curled wig and a beaded necklace who sits sideways to the viewer, looking over her shoulder. Her right knee is drawn up, held in place by her locked hands, and the delicate slipper on her right foot is a focal point that contrasts with her exaggerated facial features and the volume of her dress. She leans against a large grey rectangle behind her that suggests a tombstone, or a doorway.
meta.Alt Text: A woman in a gown and an fruit-bonnet glances over her shoulder, seated, holding one knee up.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Material: graphite, pen, gray ink, gray wash, watercolor, gouache and black chalk on medium, slightly textured, cream laid paper
meta.Subject: portrait

label: Fuseli: The Nightmare
description: In this oil-on-canvas painting, a woman dressed in a white nightgown lies sprawled on a fabric-draped couch in deep sleep, her head hanging down on the right side of the canvas, and her arms upraised on either side of her head. A dark beast sits crouched menacingly on her chest facing the viewer, and the head of a dark horse with brilliant white eyes emerges from behind a sumptuous red drape. The dormant woman's face and chest are spotlighted, leaving the most frightening and active figures in the painting in the dark, characters from her imaginative dream state that come to life for Fuseli’s audience.
meta.Alt Text: A woman in a white gown lies asleep on a bed while a gremlin sits on her chest.
meta.Location: Current: Detroit Institute of the Arts, Detroit, MI, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Romanticism
meta.Subject: dream, Romanticism

label: Gainsborough: The Gravenor Family
description: This is a group portrait done in oil on canvas of four individuals in formal dress in a wooded natural setting with the suggestion of an architectural feature in the far distance. On the left a man stands, right foot forward, with hat and cane in his left hand and right hand tucked under his coat. Beside him is a woman, dressed in a light blue and white long dress, and to her left are two girls, one dressed in a silvery-white dress and the other in a pink dress trimmed in white. A tree forms a bold diagonal behind the group, and beyond a mass of greenery the cloudy sky creates a hazy backdrop for the sharp and detailed rendering of the main subjects. To the right of the group are delicately painted stalks of wheat that bend gently inward, framing the figures.
meta.Alt Text: A group portrait shows a family in formal clothing standing in the woods.
meta.Location: Current: Yale Center for British Art, New Haven, CT, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, British, Neoclassicism
meta.Subject: group portrait

He is surrounded by standing and sitting disciples, all in various postures of grief, except for one who sits facing Buddha, his back to the viewer.

label: Garden Banquet of Ashurbanipal
description: On a flat rectangular stone in low relief, a reclining male on a throne and a seated female raise glasses in a toast. Flanking them are four pairs of servants carrying fly-whisks and dishes. Trees with crowning branches and vines overarch the garden party, showing birds flying, insects alighting, and trophy heads dangling.
rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Alt Text: banquet scene relief in stone
meta.Rights: CC BY-SA 3.0 © The Trustees of the British Museum
meta.Subject: banquet, Ashurbanipal

label: Garnier: Opéra (Palais Garnier)
description: This is a large, ornate building decorated with sculptural relief and capped by free-standing gilded figural groups. The lowest level is an arcade of seven arches, above which is a second tier composed of fluted columns on two different scales; busts are among the sculptural decorations that alternate with the columns. The elaborate architrave is punctuated by two lunettes on the projecting wings of the building, and the whole is surmounted by a large dome.
meta.Alt Text: A large domed building with columns and arches across the front.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Neoclassicism
meta.Material: marble and stone, porphyry, and gilded bronze
meta.Measurements: 154.9 m long; 70.2 m wide at the lateral galleries; 101.2 m wide at the east and west pavilions; 10.13 m from ground level to bottom of the cistern under the stage
meta.Subject: Baroque Revival, Second Empire

label: Gateway of the Sun, Tiwanaku
description: A single massive block of stone has been carved into a square with a single doorway in its center. Above the doorway, carved in relief, is a figure in the keystone position, flanked on each side with 48 squares, each a carved winged figure in it. The figure holds a staff in each hand on either side of his body.
meta.Alt Text: A single massive block of stone has been carved into a square with a single doorway in its center. Above the doorway a figure holding a staff on either side is standing.
meta.Subject: Tiwanaku

label: Gauguin: Tahitian Women on the Beach
description: Two women sit on a beach; the one on the left is resting on her right arm and facing away from the viewer, and the one on the right sits cross-legged and looking outward, toward the right of the canvas. Each has dark hair that is gathered and tied with a bow. Both women are dressed in brightly colored clothing, the one on the left in red and white, and the woman on the left in pink; these colors contrast with the beige of the sand on which they sit and the blue and green of the water behind them. The woman on the left is braiding a material that looks like raffia or wicker, perhaps a reference to traditional work in this French colony.
meta.Alt Text: Two women with dark hair and brown skin sit on the ground, both dressed in brightly colored fabrics. One is weaving.
meta.Subject: Tahitians

label: Gauguin: Where Do We Come From? What Are We? Where Are We Going?
description: This large oil-on-canvas painting represents an outdoor Tahiti island landscape with a volcano and the ocean present in the background. The bright composition showcases many figures and "island" motifs.
meta.Alt Text: Against a dark, blue-green, tropical landscape, a number of Tahitians and their domestic animals are arranged in three main groups.
meta.Location: Current: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Massachusetts, United States
meta.Subject: Tahitians

label: Gautama Buddha Calling the Earth to Witness
description: A Buddha figure sits cross-legged on a circular dais, surrounded by monstrous creatures, elephants, and human figures that are entwined in floral-and-cloud patterns. The fingertips of the Buddha's right hand touch the lotus-blossom-shaped dais he sits on.  The eyes are closed in meditation. The figure wears a red cloth draped like a robe. Four smaller figures occupy each corner; in the upper two corners the figures are seated, and in the lower two corners they stand in golden robes holding an offering bowl and a staff. Between them is an altar table with ritual objects including a wheel and flowers.
meta.Alt Text: A Buddha sits surrounded by illustrations
meta.Location: Current: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, PA, USA
meta.Subject: Shakyamuni

label: Gentileschi: Self-Portrait as the Allegory of Painting (La Pittura)
description: A woman holds a brush up to a canvas with one hand, and holds a palette with paints on it in the other. She wears a painter's smock and a necklace. Her hair is unkempt. She is peering intently at what she is painting.
meta.Alt Text: A self-portrait of the artist mid-brushstroke
meta.Subject: self portrait

label: Gerhaert von Leyden: Standing Virgin and Child
description: A delicately carved wooden sculpture shows a standing woman in gowns carrying a child.
meta.Alt Text: a delicately carved wooden sculpture of a standing woman carrying a child.
meta.Location: Current: The Cloisters, Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY, USA
meta.Cultural Context: Central and Eastern European, Austrian, Christendom, Gothic
meta.Subject: St Mary, Jesus

label: Géricault: Raft of the Medusa
description: The foreground of this dark over-life-sized oil-on-canvas painting shows two pyramidal piles of people on a precarious raft, some dead and some dying, and others waving frantically to a small ship on the horizon as they are about to be engulfed by an ominous wave moving toward them from the left side of the canvas.
meta.Alt Text: More than a dozen people, some dead, some hailing for help, float on a raft in a stormy sea.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Romanticism
meta.Subject: shipwreck

label: Gero Crucifix
description: This life-sized sculpture of the crucifixion of Christ with a golden cross and halo is displayed in Germany at the Cologne Cathedral.
meta.Alt Text: A life-sized sculpture of the crucifixion of Christ with a golden cross and halo.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, German, Christendom, Romanesque
meta.Subject: Christianity, crucifixion

label: Gérôme: The Snake Charmer
description: In this oil-on-canvas painting, a group of bearded men wearing turbans and holding weapons sits in a row against a wall painted with blue arabesque designs, watching a naked boy who stands with his back to the viewer on a carpet, holding a snake aloft.  Next to the carpet is a basket with its lid off. A seated, bearded man on the right plays the flute.
meta.Alt Text: A group of soldiers wearing turbans watch a naked snake charmer.
meta.Location: Current: Sterling and Francine Clark Art Institute, Williamstown, Massachusetts
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Orientalism, Academicism
meta.Subject: Orientalism

label: Ghiberti: Sacrifice of Isaac bronze relief
description: A bronze high relief shows a man with a beard in a robe in profile, threatening with a knife to stab a nude kneeling boy shown frontally. A winged figure above to the right gestures to stop the action, and a ram appears in the upper left of the frame, on top of a mountain. Lower on the mountain are two robed figures and a saddled horse.
rights: Public Domain © Photograph by Erich Lessing
meta.Alt Text: A man with a beard holds a knife to the throat of a nude kneeling bound young man. A winged figure intervenes. A ram sits on a mountain watching.
meta.Rights: Public Domain © Photograph by Erich Lessing
meta.Subject: Issac, Abraham

description: A polished bronze statue depicts a standing bearded man wearing a robe and sandals. He holds a parchment with letters on it in one hand, and a staff with a cross and a ribbon at the top.

label: Ghiberti: St. Stephen
description: A life-size bronze statue of a standing man wearing a robe over a collared tunic holds a book.
rights: ArtStor, Scala Archives, Florence Art Resources, NY

label: Giacometti: Man Pointing
description: This is a roughly textured cast bronze sculpture of an extremely thin man whose torso is an elongated triangle and whose body from the waist to the spread feet suggests another still longer triangle. The shape of the head, which is turned to the side and on which facial features are minimal, is also triangular, and the man’s large feet (more triangles) seem heavy, as if they are keeping the otherwise insubstantial figure attached to the thick, heavy base. The man’s right arm is extended at around a 45-degree angle, and he points his index finger; his left arm is raised and bent at the elbow, creating a long diagonal that extends from hand to hand.
rights: ArtStor: The Museum of Modern Art: Painting and Sculpture
meta.Alt Text: A bronze statue of a man as thin as a stick.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Surrealism, Modernism

label: Gislebertus: Last Judgment Tympanum (St Lazare)
description: Tympanum of the Cathedral at Autun, showing the Last Judgment. In the center, a very large figure of Christ on a throne extends his arms, his hand open and the palms turned to the viewer. On his right hand, we see the figures of the saved, carved at half the height (or less) of Jesus; highest among them is the Virgin Mary. On the left of Jesus (viewer's right), we see an angel and a demon weighing souls; at the far left, the damned are being tortured by demons. A line of text separates the main images from a lower register, in which we see a line of humans, resurrected on the Day of Judgment, (each approximately one-sixth the height of Jesus) awaiting their fate.
meta.Alt Text: Tympanum of the Cathedral at Autun, depicting Christ at the Last Judgment.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Romanesque
meta.Measurements: Width: 640 cm; Height of Christ: 305 cm.
meta.Subject: Christianity

label: Gislebertus: Temptation of Eve (St. Lazare)
description: A woman with long hair (Eve) lies with her naked torso facing the viewer; her waist and legs are turned to the side, and a plant with large leaves obscures her waist and loins. She is balanced on her knees and right elbow; her right hand cups her chin as she looks into the distance with an abstracted expression. Her left arm trails behind her, a piece of fruit in her left hand. Vegetation frames her, with the tree on which the fruit grew being at her feet and another vine before her head.
meta.Alt Text: Sculpture of Eve lying with her naked torso facing the viewer; a plant with large leaves obscures her waist and loins.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western European, French, Christendom, Romanesque
meta.Subject: Eve

label: Golden Throne from Tutankhamun's Burial Site
description: Gold and silver throne with an image made of inlaid semi-precious stones showing a seated male wearing a crown, a necklace, and a kilt, with his right arm resting on his chair back. In front of him, touching him with her right hand, is a female figure wearing a crown, a necklace, and a dress, holding a small pot in her hand. Above them is a sun disk with rays emerging from its lower half, the ends of which are tipped with ankhs. Behind the female figure is a table with a disk on it, from the top of which emerge some plant-shapes. Two lion heads appear on the front of the arm rests, which show wings and crowned snake shapes. Lion paws appear on the legs of the chair where it meets the floor.
meta.Alt Text: A double row of columns with Papyrus leaves at the tops.
meta.Material: wood covered in gold and of silver, tiles of coloured semi-precious stones, coloured glass
meta.Subject: Tutankhamun

label: Gorget showing running warrior
description: Carved on a round flat shell in relief is a human figure whose legs are seen from the side in a running position, with each toe touching the lower rim of the circular shell. The triangular loincloth, torso, and arms are all presented frontally. A severed head is held in the right hand, and a mace or club is held in the left. The figure's head is depicted in profile, looking backwards. A necklace, ear spool, and elaborate head piece are shown.
rights: National Museum of the American Indian, Smithsonian Institution, Photo Services.
meta.Alt Text: A human figure carved on a circular shell shows legs in a running position, wearing a loincloth. A severed head is held in the right hand, and a mace or club is held in the left.

meta.Rights: National Museum of the American Indian, Smithsonian Institution, Photo Services.

label: Goya: “Might Not the Pupil Know More”
description: On the upper right side of the etching is a donkey ridiculously dressed in the cap and clothing of a schoolmaster. To the viewer’s left, a smaller donkey dressed in a shirt too large for its frame points with its left hoof to the letter A written in a book in the teacher’s lap. Behind the student donkey are three other donkeys that seem to be fellow students, these rendered with much less detail than the two central animals.
meta.Alt Text: An adult donkey dressed as a teacher sits in front of a child-donkey dressed as a student.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Romanticism
meta.Subject: education

label: Goya: Disasters of War Plate 37
description: This intaglio print features etching, lavis, and drypoint.  The central figure is the back of a naked man who has been stabbed in the torso and whose arms have been severed; he seems to turn toward the viewer while precariously straddling a tree stump. In the background on the left lie fallen soldiers, while on the right another soldier charges forward with his sword held high.
meta.Alt Text: An impaled, armless man sits on a tree stump, with dead soldiers nearby.
meta.Location: Current: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY USA
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Romanticism
meta.Measurements: Plate: 15.3 x 20.2 cm Sheet: 25.3 x 34.4 cm
meta.Subject: war

label: Goya: The Sleep of Reason Produces Monsters
description: This etching represents a man sleeping at a desk that reads ""El sueño de la razón produce monstruos" in Spanish, translated in English as "The sleep of reason produces monsters." Various bats and owls fly above his head. On the ground, a lynx sits and stares at the viewer. The chaotic scene serves as a metaphor for the monstrosities that are released from within us when our sense of reason fails to govern them.
meta.Alt Text: A man sits with his head down on a desk as various animals fly around him.
meta.Location: Current: Museo Nacional del Prado, Madrid, Spain
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Romanticism
meta.Subject: owls, caricature

label: Goya: The Third of May 1808
description: This oil-on-canvas painting shows a group of men wearing everyday clothes, backed up against a mound of earth, kneeling in poses of fear or surrender in front of five uniformed soldiers taking aim with rifles.  A pile of bleeding dead bodies lies at the feet of those about to be executed. In the background is a crowd of cowering witnesses, and a cityscape rises against a blackened sky.
meta.Alt Text: A firing squad of five soldiers corners a group of men and take aim at them.
meta.Cultural Context: Northern and Western Europe, Spanish, Romanticism
meta.Subject: history painting

label: Great Pyramids, Giza
description: The Pyramids of Giza are the most distinctive features of the sprawling funerary complex of three 4th Dynasty kings, Khufu, Khafre & Menkaure. The largest (and oldest) is the pyramid of Khufu. The pyramids have broad square bases, four sloping triangular sides and a pointed peak. The cut stone blocks of the structures are now visible. (The outer mantle originally was composed highly polished casing stones, now stripped off). Only the pyramid of Khafre has some veneer remaining at the top.
meta.Alt Text: Three large pyramids arise out of a flat sandy plain.
meta.Measurements:
1. Great Pyramid (Khufu's): Height:138.8 m. Base each side: 230.4 m. 
2. Khafre's Pyramid: H.136.4 m, base length: 215.5 m
3.Menkaure's pyramid: H.61 m., Base length:108.5 m.
meta.Subject: funerary complex

meta.Measurements: L. 73 m from paw to tail; H. 20.21 m from base to the top of the head and W. 19 metres at its rear haunches.
